sentences.chinese: 新当选的总统紧随其后，坐着6匹灰色骏马开道的敞篷马车。

sentences.english: a railway carriage
sentences.chinese: 铁路客车厢

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle with wheels that is pulled by a horse, used in the past

sentences.english: The content of the media course includes scripting, editing and camera work.
sentences.chinese: 大众传媒课程的内容包括稿件写作、剪辑和摄像操作。

detailed_translations.english: the ideas, facts, or opinions that are contained in a speech, piece of writing, film, programme etc

sentences.english: You can park on either side of the street.
sentences.chinese: 这条街两边都可停车。

detailed_translations.english: one or the other of two; it does not matter which

sentences.english: How much space is there on each disk?
sentences.chinese: 每张磁盘有多大容量？

sentences.english: The hedge takes up too much space .
sentences.chinese: 这树篱占了太多的地方。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of an area, room, container etc that is empty or available to be used

sentences.english: the editor of the Daily Telegraph
sentences.chinese: 《每日电讯报》的主编

detailed_translations.english: the person who is in charge of a newspaper or magazine, or part of a newspaper or magazine, and decides what should be included in it

sentences.english: The custom of arranged marriages still exists in many countries.
sentences.chinese: 许多国家仍存在包办婚姻的习俗。

sentences.english: Opportunities exist for students to gain sponsorship.
sentences.chinese: 学生有机会获得资助。

sentences.english: Stop pretending that the problem doesn’t exist.
sentences.chinese: 别再假装这个问题不存在了。

sentences.english: We existed on a diet of rice.
sentences.chinese: 我们靠吃大米过活。

detailed_translations.english: to be present in a place or situation

sentences.english: measures to limit the scope of criminals’ activities
sentences.chinese: 限制罪犯活动范围的措施

detailed_translations.english: the range of things that a subject, activity, book etc deals with

sentences.english: the opening paragraphs of the novel
sentences.chinese: 小说开篇的几个段落

detailed_translations.english: part of a piece of writing which starts on a new line and contains at least one sentence

sentences.english: clear instructions
sentences.chinese: 明确的指示

sentences.english: The question wasn’t very clear.
sentences.chinese: 这问题不是很清楚。

sentences.english: It’s the clearest guide I’ve used.
sentences.chinese: 我从没用过这么清晰易懂的指南。

sentences.english: Perhaps I tried to cover too much and didn’t make myself clear (= express myself well ) .
sentences.chinese: 可能是我涉及的内容太多，没有表达清楚。

sentences.english: If you don’t understand, it’s best to say so and get things clear .
sentences.chinese: 如果你不明白，那就最好照直说并把事情弄清楚。

sentences.english: If I catch you smoking again, you’re grounded. Do I make myself clear (= used when you are angry ) ?
sentences.chinese: 如果再让我发现你抽烟，我就罚你不准出门。我的话你听清楚了吗？

sentences.english: Snowplows have been out clearing the roads.
sentences.chinese: 扫雪机已经出动，去清扫路面了。

detailed_translations.english: expressed in a simple and direct way so that people understand
to make somewhere emptier or tidier by removing things from it

sentences.english: We made for the nearest exit.
sentences.chinese: 我们走向最近的出口。

sentences.english: an exit door
sentences.chinese: 出口门

sentences.english: Two men were blocking her exit.
sentences.chinese: 两个男人挡住了她出去的路。

detailed_translations.english: a door or space through which you can leave a public room, building etc
to leave a place

sentences.english: This is Gavin Williams, reporting from the United Nations in New York.
sentences.chinese: 我是加文·威廉斯，在纽约联合国总部为您报道。

sentences.english: We aim to report the news as fairly as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我们力求公正地报道这一新闻。

sentences.english: The incident was widely reported in the national press.
sentences.chinese: 这一事件在全国的媒体上被广泛报道。

detailed_translations.english: to give people information about recent events, especially in newspapers and on television and radio

sentences.english: a public execution
sentences.chinese: 当众处死

sentences.english: The two men face execution (= They will be killed as a punishment ).
sentences.chinese: 两名男子面临处决。

sentences.english: Torture and summary execution (= execution without a trial or any legal process ) are common.
sentences.chinese: 严刑拷打和不经审判就地处决相当普遍。

sentences.english: He was granted a stay of execution (= delay in carrying out an execution ).
sentences.chinese: 他被准予缓期处决。

detailed_translations.chinese: 死刑； 实行， 执行， 履行； 演奏， 表演
detailed_translations.english: when someone is killed, especially as a legal punishment

sentences.english: There is no emergency back-up immediately available.
sentences.chinese: 没有立即就能获得的后备。

detailed_translations.english: Backup consists of extra equipment, resources, or people that you can get help or support from if necessary

sentences.english: Is the coffee break the adult version of recess?
sentences.chinese: 工间喝咖啡是成人的休息方式吗？

detailed_translations.english: a way of explaining or doing something that is typical of a particular group or period of time

sentences.english: I can’t find the car keys.
sentences.chinese: 我找不到汽车钥匙。

sentences.english: Hold on while I find a pen.
sentences.chinese: 别挂电话，我找支笔。

sentences.english: Her body was later found hidden in the bushes.
sentences.chinese: 后来有人发现她的尸体被藏在了灌木丛里。

sentences.english: I have to find somewhere else to live.
sentences.chinese: 我得另找住处。

sentences.english: She had almost given up hope of finding a husband.
sentences.chinese: 她差不多要放弃找个丈夫的希望了。

sentences.english: Her mother went to the shops, and on her return, Kathleen was nowhere to be found (= could not be found ) .
sentences.chinese: 妈妈去买东西，回来的时候凯思琳找不到了。

detailed_translations.english: to discover, see, or get something that you have been searching for

sentences.english: Position the mouse pointer and click.
sentences.chinese: 把光标对准位置并点击。

detailed_translations.english: something that shows how a situation is developing, or is a sign of what might happen in the future

sentences.english: ...subsets of the population such as men, women, ethnic groups, etc.
sentences.chinese: ...人口子集包括男人、女人、不同民族等。

detailed_translations.english: a group of people or things that is part of a larger group of people or things

sentences.english: a computer keyboard
sentences.chinese: 计算机键盘

detailed_translations.english: a board with buttons marked with letters or numbers that are pressed to put information into a computer or other machine

detailed_translations.chinese: 键入；用键盘式排字机排字
detailed_translations.english: to put information into a computer, using a keyboard

sentences.english: The train was completely full.
sentences.chinese: 火车坐得满满的。

sentences.english: Don’t talk with your mouth full.
sentences.chinese: 嘴里塞满东西时不要说话。

sentences.english: The class is full, but you can register for next term.
sentences.chinese: 这个班已经满了，不过你可以注册下学期的。

sentences.english: The Health Centre offers a full range of services.
sentences.chinese: 医疗中心提供全套服务。

detailed_translations.english: containing as much or as many things or people as possible, so there is no space left

sentences.english: Check the tiles carefully before you buy them.
sentences.chinese: 购买之前要把瓷砖仔细检查一下。

sentences.english: A first rule in solving any mystery is to check the facts.
sentences.chinese: 揭开谜团的第一条规则是核查事实。

sentences.english: The police are failing to take adequate measures to check the growth in crime.
sentences.chinese: 警方未能采取适当的措施来阻止犯罪率上升。

sentences.english: Conduct regular checks on your water quality.
sentences.chinese: 要经常检查水质。

detailed_translations.english: to do something in order to find out whether something really is correct, true, or in good condition
the process of finding out if something is safe, correct, true, or in the condition it should be

sentences.english: He shouldn’t be so selfish.
sentences.chinese: 他不该这么自私。

sentences.english: Why should anyone want to marry Tony?
sentences.chinese: 怎么竟然会有人意嫁给托尼？

detailed_translations.english: used to say what is the right or sensible thing to do

sentences.english: A single tree gave shade from the sun.
sentences.chinese: 唯有一棵树遮阴。

sentences.english: They won the game by a single point.
sentences.chinese: 他们仅以一分的优势赢得比赛。

sentences.english: the highest price ever paid for a single work of art
sentences.chinese: 为单件艺术品所支付的最高价格

sentences.english: a single-sex school
sentences.chinese: 单一性别的学校

detailed_translations.english: only one
a ticket for a trip from one place to another but not back again

sentences.english: How are you positioning yourself?
sentences.chinese: 你是怎样为自己定位的？

sentences.english: When in cursor-positioning mode, the user can tab to, or position the cursor on, any character in the input field.
sentences.chinese: 当您处于游标定位模式时，用户可以切换，或者定位游标到输入区域的任何一个字符之上。

sentences.english: However it seems clear that the major players are aware of this opportunity and are positioning their services to capture it.
sentences.chinese: 然而主要的竞争参与者似乎已经明显地意识到这个机会，正在定位它们的服务来抓住这个机会。

detailed_translations.chinese: [计] 定位（position的现在分词）；放置

sentences.english: Tea and biscuits will be provided.
sentences.chinese: 有茶水和饼干供应。

detailed_translations.english: to give something to someone or make it available to them, because they need it or want it

sentences.english: "Patience and Sarah" was first published in 1969 under the title "A Place for Us."
sentences.chinese: 《耐心与萨拉》于1969年以《我们的地方》为书名首次出版。

sentences.english: Pirandello titled his play "Six Characters in Search of an Author."
sentences.chinese: 皮兰德娄将其戏剧命名为《六个寻找作者的剧中人》。

sentences.english: The single is titled "White Love."
sentences.chinese: 这支单曲名为《白色之恋》。

detailed_translations.chinese: 冠军；标题；头衔；权利；字幕
detailed_translations.english: the name given to a particular book, painting, play etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 加标题于；赋予头衔；把…称为
detailed_translations.english: When a writer, composer, or artist titles a work, they give it a name

sentences.english: Student leaders are demanding greater freedom of expression (= the right to say what you think without being punished ).
sentences.chinese: 学生领袖要求得到更多的言论自由。

detailed_translations.chinese: 词语； 表达， 表情
detailed_translations.english: something you say, write, or do that shows what you think or feel

sentences.english: How many working days were lost through sickness last year?
sentences.chinese: 去年因为员工生病损失了多少个工作日？

detailed_translations.english: because of something

sentences.english: The spy sent his message in code.
sentences.chinese: 这个间谍用密码发送情报。

sentences.english: But we have not yet implemented this in the code.
sentences.chinese: 但我们在代码中尚未实现此功能。

sentences.english: The hacker came smack up against the company's policy of keeping its records in code.
sentences.chinese: 这个计算机黑客突然碰壁了，因这家公司实行了用密码保存公司纪录的政策。

sentences.english: How dared they do such a thing?
sentences.chinese: 他们怎么敢做出这样的事?

sentences.english: He would not succumb to such an item.
sentences.chinese: 他不会对这样的条款做出让步的。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that you think that something is not good enough or that there is not enough of it

sentences.english: There’s a short poem at the beginning of every chapter.
sentences.chinese: 每一章的开头都有一首短诗。

sentences.english: From the beginning of my career as a journalist, I’ve been writing about gender issues.
sentences.chinese: 从我一开始干记者这一行，我就写性别议题的题材。

sentences.english: I thought he loved me; perhaps he did in the beginning .
sentences.chinese: 我以为他爱我，也许开始时他确实是爱我的。

sentences.english: That chance meeting marked the beginning of a long and happy relationship.
sentences.chinese: 那次邂逅展开了一段长久而幸福的关系。

sentences.english: This is just the beginning of a new and different life for you.
sentences.chinese: 这只是你新的别样生活的开始。

sentences.english: I said he would cause trouble, right from the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 我一开始就说过，他会惹事。

sentences.english: I opposed it from the very beginning.
sentences.chinese: 我一开始就反对。

sentences.english: The whole trip was a disaster from beginning to end.
sentences.chinese: 旅途从头到尾都在出乱子。

sentences.english: I think I have the beginnings of a cold.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉要感冒了。

sentences.english: He rose from humble beginnings to great wealth.
sentences.chinese: 他出身卑微，如今已腰缠万贯。

detailed_translations.english: the start or first part of an event, story, period of time etc

sentences.english: a tour guide
sentences.chinese: 导游

sentences.english: an experienced mountain guide
sentences.chinese: 一位有经验的登山向导

sentences.english: We were guided around the museums.
sentences.chinese: 我们在导游的带领下参观了博物馆。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to take tourists to a place and show them around
to show sb the way to a place, often by going with them

sentences.english: As a kid, I loved to climb trees.
sentences.chinese: 小时候，我喜欢爬树。

sentences.english: the trunk of an old oak tree (= the main central part, from which the branches grow )
sentences.chinese: 一棵老橡树的树干

detailed_translations.english: a very tall plant that has branches and leaves, and lives for many years

sentences.english: Some of these chemicals are very damaging to the environment.
sentences.chinese: 这些化学品中有些对环境非常有害。

sentences.english: legislation to protect the environment
sentences.chinese: 保护环境的法规

sentences.english: the effects of acid rain on the environment
sentences.chinese: 酸雨对环境的影响

sentences.english: the government minister for the environment
sentences.chinese: 负责环境事务的政府部长

detailed_translations.english: the air, water, and land on Earth, which is affected by man’s activities

sentences.english: It’s an old car, but it’s very reliable.
sentences.chinese: 这是一辆旧车，但是性能非常可靠。

sentences.english: They rushed to the hospital, but they were too late.
sentences.chinese: 他们急忙赶到医院，但是已经太迟了。

sentences.english: We’ve invited the boss, but she may decide not to come.
sentences.chinese: 我们邀请过老板，但她有可能决定不来。

sentences.english: an expensive but extremely useful book
sentences.chinese: 价钱很贵却是非常有用的一本书

sentences.english: ‘Has he got any experience?’ ‘No, but he’s keen to learn.’
sentences.chinese: “他有经验吗？”“没有，但他非常好学。”

detailed_translations.english: used to connect two statements or phrases when the second one adds something different or seems surprising after the first one

sentences.english: modern labour-saving devices
sentences.chinese: 省力的现代设备

detailed_translations.chinese: 器械， 装置； 设计； 手段， 策略
detailed_translations.english: a machine or tool that does a special job

sentences.english: Your résumé should highlight your skills and achievements.
sentences.chinese: 你的简历应该突出自己的技能和成绩。

sentences.english: That weekend in Venice was definitely the highlight of our trip.
sentences.chinese: 在威尼斯度过的那个周末无疑是我们这次旅行最精彩的部分。

detailed_translations.english: to make a problem or subject easy to notice so that people pay attention to it
the most important, interesting, or enjoyable part of something such as a holiday, performance, or sports competition

sentences.english: You may call it harmless fun, but I call it pornography.
sentences.chinese: 你可能会说这是无恶意的小玩笑，但是我却认为这是色情。

sentences.english: I heard someone calling in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 我听到远处有人在叫。

detailed_translations.english: to use a word or name to describe someone or something in a particular way

sentences.english: He will be continuing his education in the US.
sentences.chinese: 他将在美国继续求学。

sentences.english: 英文例句: I felt too sick to continue.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉很难受，无法继续下去了。

sentences.english: 英文例句:The road continues northwards to the border.
sentences.chinese: 中文例句: 这条路往北一直延伸到边境。

detailed_translations.english: to not stop happening, existing, or doing something

sentences.english: The study indicates a connection between poverty and crime.
sentences.chinese: 研究显示贫穷和犯罪有关联。

detailed_translations.english: to show that a particular situation exists, or that something is likely to be true

sentences.english: The ticket is valid until March.
sentences.chinese: 这张票的有效期一直到 3 月份。

sentences.english: He waited until she had finished speaking.
sentences.chinese: 他一直等到她讲完。

sentences.english: Until recently, Anna worked as a teacher in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 直到最近，安娜一直在日本当老师。

sentences.english: Up until last year, they didn’t even own a car.
sentences.chinese: 一直到去年，他们连汽车也没有。

detailed_translations.english: if something happens until a particular time, it continues and then stops at that time
if something happens until a particular time, it continues and then stops at that time

sentences.english: As everybody’s here, let’s begin.
sentences.chinese: 大家都到齐了，我们就开始吧。

sentences.english: In the third year students begin the study of classical Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 学生在三年级开始学古代汉语。

sentences.english: The president begins talks with the prime minister tonight.
sentences.chinese: 总统将于今晚和首相展开会谈。

detailed_translations.english: to start doing something
to start doing something

sentences.english: Make sure you keep the key in a safe place.
sentences.chinese: 一定要把钥匙放在安全的地方。

sentences.english: I’ve spent the day dashing about from place to place.
sentences.chinese: 我这一天尽是在东奔西跑。

sentences.english: The place was full of screaming children.
sentences.chinese: 那地方全是大叫大嚷的孩子们。

sentences.english: He was threatening to burn the place down.
sentences.chinese: 他扬言要把那地方烧毁。

sentences.english: She had never been back to the place where the accident happened.
sentences.chinese: 她再也没回过事故发生的地点。

sentences.english: The theatre bar was our usual meeting place.
sentences.chinese: 这个剧院酒吧是我们见面的老地方。

sentences.english: We were living then in a place called Alberiga.
sentences.chinese: 那时候我们住在一个叫阿尔伯里格的地方。

sentences.english: The wall was quite damp in places (= in some places ) .
sentences.chinese: 墙上有几处很潮湿。

sentences.english: Did the accident happen at your place of work (= the place where you work ) ?
sentences.chinese: 事故是在你的工作地点发生的吗？

sentences.english: It took us ages to find a place to live.
sentences.chinese: 我们花了好长时间才找到一个住处。

detailed_translations.english: a space or area, for example a particular point on a surface or in a room, building, town, city etc

sentences.english: Tel Aviv's Kings Square was renamed Yitzhak Rabin Square.
sentences.chinese: 特拉维夫的国王广场更名为伊扎克·拉宾广场。

detailed_translations.english: to give something a new name

sentences.english: a fair swap
sentences.chinese: 公平交换

sentences.english: We can do a swap if you like.
sentences.chinese: 如果你愿意我们可以交换。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which you give something to someone and get another thing in return
to give something to someone and get something in return

sentences.english: There isn’t a lot of work at this time of the year.
sentences.chinese: 每年这个时候工作机会都不多。

sentences.english: He’s been out of work (= without a job ) for two years.
sentences.chinese: 他失业有两年了。

sentences.english: More people are in work (= have a job ) than ten years ago.
sentences.chinese: 现在有工作的人比十年前多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工作；[物] 功；产品；操作；职业；行为；事业；工厂；著作；文学、音乐或艺术作品
detailed_translations.english: a job or activity that you do regularly, especially in order to earn money

detailed_translations.chinese: 使工作；操作；经营；使缓慢前进
detailed_translations.english: to do the activities and duties that are part of your job

sentences.english: The refugees were allowed to remain in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 难民获准留在英国。

sentences.english: They were cleaning up the remains of their picnic.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在打扫野餐的残余物。

detailed_translations.english: to stay in the same place without moving away

detailed_translations.chinese: 残余； 残骸； 遗迹
detailed_translations.english: Theremainsof something are the parts of it that are left after most of it has been taken away or destroyed

sentences.english: Would you mind if I closed the window?
sentences.chinese: 我把窗户关上你不介意吧？

sentences.english: She closed the curtains.
sentences.chinese: 她拉上了窗帘。

sentences.english: Let me do the car door – it won’t close properly.
sentences.chinese: 我来修一下车门，它关不紧。

sentences.english: Beth closed her eyes and tried to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 贝丝合上眼睛想睡觉。

sentences.english: She heard the door close behind her.
sentences.chinese: 她听见门在她身后关上了。

sentences.english: I will now close the meeting by asking you to join me in a final toast.
sentences.chinese: 现在我要请大家最后干一杯来结束这次会议。

detailed_translations.english: to shut something in order to cover an opening, or to become shut in this way

sentences.english: a combination nightclub and café
sentences.chinese: 夜总会兼咖啡馆

detailed_translations.english: two or more different things that exist together or are used or put together

sentences.english: Dani has a lovely profile.
sentences.chinese: 达尼的侧面轮廓很好看。

detailed_translations.chinese: 侧面；人物简介；轮廓，形象；姿态，引人注目的状态
detailed_translations.english: a side view of someone’s head
to write or give a short description of someone or something

sentences.english: Unless some extra money is found, the theatre will close.
sentences.chinese: 要是不能找到更多资金，剧院将要关闭。

sentences.english: I think you should complain – unless, of course, you are happy with the way things are.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得你应该发发牢骚——当然，除非你对现状很满意。

sentences.english: He won’t go to sleep unless you tell him a story.
sentences.chinese: 要是你不给他讲故事他就不睡觉。

sentences.english: I can’t leave her unless I know she’s all right.
sentences.chinese: 除非我知道她没事，否则我不能离开她。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that something will happen or be true if something else does not happen or is not true

sentences.english: The troops will not advance until ordered to do so .
sentences.chinese: 在接到命令之前，部队不会前进。

sentences.english: Did Luke sell them? And, if so , what happened to the money?
sentences.chinese: 卢克把它们卖了吗？如果是这样的话，那钱到哪里去了？

sentences.english: ‘Has he lost a fortune?’ ‘ So they say .’
sentences.chinese: “他输掉了一大笔钱吗？”“他们是这么说的。”

sentences.english: ‘Look – I’ve even cleaned the windows.’ ‘ So I see .’
sentences.chinese: “瞧，我把窗子也擦干净了。”“我看到了。”

sentences.english: Parents can withdraw their child from school if they so wish .
sentences.chinese: 家长要是愿意，可以让孩子退学。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer back to an idea, action, quality, situation etc that has just been mentioned
used to say that someone does something because of the reason just stated

sentences.english: They were all there except me.
sentences.chinese: 除了我以外他们都在那里。

sentences.english: We all went except him.
sentences.chinese: 除他以外， 我们都去了。

sentences.english: They all howled with laughter except me.
sentences.chinese: 除了我以外，他们全都哈哈大笑起来。

sentences.english: Ricky turned and walked away.
sentences.chinese: 里基转身走了。

sentences.english: She turned her head in surprise.
sentences.chinese: 她惊讶地转过头来。

sentences.english: Brigitte glared at him, turned on her heel (= turned away suddenly because of anger ) , and stomped out of the room.
sentences.chinese: 布丽吉特瞪了他一眼，猛地一转身，噔噔噔地走出了房间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 转动，使旋转；转弯；翻过来；兑换
detailed_translations.english: to move your body so that you are looking in a different direction

detailed_translations.chinese: 转弯；变化；(损害或有益于别人的)行为，举动，举止
detailed_translations.english: a sudden or unexpected change that makes a situation develop in a different way

sentences.english: I’ll be back in a minute.
sentences.chinese: 我马上回来。

sentences.english: Put that book back where you found it!
sentences.chinese: 把那本书放回原处！

sentences.english: He was back home by half past eleven.
sentences.chinese: 他是11点半之前回家的。

sentences.english: It’s possible to travel there and back in a day.
sentences.chinese: 到那里一天来回是可以的。

sentences.english: Kirov stepped back a pace.
sentences.chinese: 基洛夫往后退了一步。

detailed_translations.english: in, into, or to the place or position where someone or something was before

sentences.english: ‘That’s Sarah’s cousin.’ ‘Are you sure?’
sentences.chinese: “那是萨拉的表妹。”“你肯定吗？”

sentences.english: ‘What time does the show start?’ ‘I’m not sure.’
sentences.chinese: “表演什么时候开始？”“我说不准。”

sentences.english: My mother, I felt sure , had not met him before.
sentences.chinese: 我敢肯定我妈妈以前从未见过他。

detailed_translations.english: confident that you know something or that something is true or correct
used to say ‘yes’ to someone

sentences.english: The plane’s tail section was found in a cornfield.
sentences.chinese: 飞机的尾部在玉米田里找到了。

sentences.english: the smoking section (= where you can smoke )
sentences.chinese: 吸烟区

detailed_translations.english: one of the parts that something such as an object or place is divided into

sentences.english: Are those men following us?
sentences.chinese: 那些人在跟着我们吗？

sentences.english: The patrol car followed the BMW for a few miles and then lost it.
sentences.chinese: 巡逻车跟了那辆宝马几英里，后来就跟丢了。

sentences.english: The conclusion that follows from these findings is that inner city schools need more investment, not less.
sentences.chinese: 根据这些调研得出的结论是，旧城区学校的资金投入需要增加，而不是减少。

detailed_translations.english: to go, walk, drive etc behind or after someone else

sentences.english: The branch split under their weight.
sentences.chinese: 树枝承受不住他们的重量断裂了。

sentences.english: In a severe gale the ship split in two.
sentences.chinese: 在一次强劲的大风中那艘船断成了两半。

sentences.english: If the chicken is fairly small, you may simply split it in half.
sentences.chinese: 要是鸡不太大，你把它分成两半就行。

detailed_translations.english: to divide or separate something into different parts or groups, or to be divided into different parts or groups
If something splits or if you split it, it is divided into two or more parts

sentences.english: You don’t really need a car.
sentences.chinese: 你其实并不需要一辆车。

sentences.english: Plants need light in order to survive.
sentences.chinese: 植物需要光才能存活。

sentences.english: The camcorder needs a new battery.

sentences.english: Are you sure that you have everything you need?

detailed_translations.english: to have to have something or someone, because you cannot do something without them, or because you cannot continue or cannot exist without them
to have to have something or someone, because you cannot do something without them, or because you cannot continue or cannot exist without them

sentences.english: Access is by means of a small door on the right.
sentences.chinese: 入口是右边的一扇小门。

detailed_translations.chinese: 接近；通道，入口；接近的机会
detailed_translations.english: the way you use to enter a building or reach a place
to find information, especially on a computer

sentences.english: Additional information can be obtained from the centre.
sentences.chinese: 可以从中心获取更多信息。

detailed_translations.english: more than what was agreed or expected

sentences.chinese: 我们的航班取消了。

sentences.english: I’m afraid I’ll have to cancel our meeting tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕我得取消我们明天的会议。

sentences.english: You’ll just have to ring John and cancel.
sentences.chinese: 你只能打电话给约翰取消了。

sentences.english: She produces legal documents for a downtown Seattle law firm.
sentences.chinese: 她为西雅图市区的一家法律事务所撰写法律文件。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of paper that has official information on it
to write about something, film it, or take photographs of it, in order to record information about it

sentences.english: In some cases people have had to wait several weeks for an appointment.
sentences.chinese: 在某些情况下，人们必须等上好几周才能得到约见。

sentences.english: a severe case of typhoid

sentences.english: It is simply not the case that prison conditions are improving.
sentences.chinese: 监狱条件得到改善的情况绝非事实。

detailed_translations.english: a particular situation or a situation of a particular type

sentences.chinese: 说明：在从数字到字符科协截断有效数字。

sentences.english: If the data type of the field is numeric, the field is added to the Values area, with a default aggregation of sum.
sentences.chinese: 如果这个字段的数据类型为数值，那么这个字段就会增加到值区域，形成一个求和的默认集合。

sentences.english: Propagation of seismic wave in complex medium is mostly simulated by numeric solution of oneway or two-way wave equation.
sentences.chinese: 复杂介质中地震波的传播多是通过求取单程或双程波动方程的数值解进行模拟的。

sentences.english: The plate went crashing to the floor.
sentences.chinese: 盘子哗啦一声掉在地板上。

sentences.english: The bullet went flying over my head.
sentences.chinese: 子弹从我头顶飞过。

sentences.english: John went rushing off down the corridor.
sentences.chinese: 约翰沿走廊飞奔而去。

sentences.english: Her hair is starting to go grey.
sentences.chinese: 她的头发开始变白了。

detailed_translations.english: to move in a particular way, or to do something as you are moving

sentences.english: Have you finished loading up?
sentences.chinese: 你装完货了吗？

sentences.english: It took an hour to load the van.
sentences.chinese: 给小型货车装货花了一小时。

sentences.english: Will you help me load the dishwasher?
sentences.chinese: 你帮我把碗碟放进洗碗机好吗？

sentences.english: The plane was carrying afull loadof fuel.
sentences.chinese: 飞机载满燃料。

detailed_translations.english: to put a large quantity of something into a vehicle or container
a large quantity of something that is carried by a vehicle, person etc

sentences.english: Let’s have a rest and then we’ll try again.
sentences.chinese: 我们休息一下，然后再试。

sentences.english: I tried everything to lose weight with no success.
sentences.chinese: 我试了各种方法减肥，但都没有成功。

sentences.english: I tried and tried (= kept making an effort ) and eventually I was offered a job.
sentences.chinese: 我一次次地尝试，终于有人给了我一份工作。

sentences.english: Try as he might (= as hard as he could ) , he could not get the incident out of his mind.
sentences.chinese: 他想尽办法，但脑子里仍摆脱不掉那件事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 试图，努力；试验；审判；考验
detailed_translations.english: to take action in order to do something that you may not be able to do
an attempt to do something

sentences.english: He’s a small boy, about John’s size.
sentences.chinese: 他是个小男孩，个子和约翰差不多。

sentences.english: Jensens’ house is about the same size as ours.
sentences.chinese: 詹森的房子和我们的差不多大。

sentences.english: He’s quite a big dog, but he’s still not full size yet.
sentences.chinese: 这条狗体型很大，但还没有长足。

detailed_translations.english: how big or small something is
to sort according to size

sentences.english: It was the worst day in my entire life.
sentences.chinese: 那是我一生中最糟糕的一天。

sentences.english: The entire staff agreed.
sentences.chinese: 全体员工都同意了。

sentences.english: Have you drunk the entire bottle?
sentences.chinese: 你把整瓶酒都喝了吗？

detailed_translations.english: used when you want to emphasize that you mean all of a group, period of time, amount etc

sentences.english: My baby gets upset when I leave the room.
sentences.chinese: 我一离开房间宝宝就会不安。

sentences.english: Before leaving the train, make sure you have all your belongings with you.
sentences.chinese: 下火车前一定要带好随身物品。

sentences.english: Leave the motorway at Junction 7.
sentences.chinese: 请在七号交叉路口驶离高速公路。

sentences.english: My youngest boy has not left my side (= has stayed near me ) since his daddy was killed.
sentences.chinese: 我最小的儿子自从他爸爸死后就没有离开过我的身边。

detailed_translations.english: to go away from a place or a person
to go away from a place or a person

sentences.english: Throughout history the achievements of women have been largely ignored.
sentences.chinese: 从古至今，妇女的成就都被大大地忽视了。

sentences.english: No man in recent history has done more to rebuild the Democratic Party.
sentences.chinese: 他对重建民主党的贡献在近代史上无人能及。

sentences.english: the early history of Scotland
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰的早期历史

sentences.english: Other meteor storms have occurred in recorded history .
sentences.chinese: 在有记载的历史上发生过其他的流星暴。

sentences.english: a museum devoted to local history
sentences.chinese: 专门介绍当地历史的博物馆

sentences.english: one of the darkest episodes in American history
sentences.chinese: 美国历史上最黑暗的事件之一

sentences.english: an interesting period in Egyptian history
sentences.chinese: 埃及历史上一段有趣的时期

sentences.english: a decision that changed the course of history
sentences.chinese: 改变历史进程的决定

sentences.english: a college steeped in history
sentences.chinese: 一所历史悠久的学院

sentences.english: Your doctor will ask for your medical history.
sentences.chinese: 医生会询问你的病历。

detailed_translations.english: all the things that happened in the past, especially the political, social, or economic development of a nation

sentences.english: Any proposal must be seconded by two other members of the committee.
sentences.chinese: 任何提案须有委员会其他两位委员附议。

detailed_translations.english: to formally support a suggestion made by another person in a meeting

sentences.english: Output is up 30% on last year.
sentences.chinese: 产量比去年提高了30%。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of goods or work produced by a person, machine, factory etc
if a computer outputs information, it produces it

sentences.english: She opened her suitcase and took out a pair of shoes.
sentences.chinese: 她打开手提箱，拿出一双鞋。

sentences.english: Lock the door on your way out.
sentences.chinese: 你出去时把门锁上。

sentences.english: Charlotte went to the window and looked out.
sentences.chinese: 夏洛特走到窗前往外看。

sentences.english: Out you go (= used to order someone to leave a room )!
sentences.chinese: 你给我出去！

sentences.english: When the sun came out, a rainbow formed in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 太阳出来时，天空中出现了一道彩虹。

detailed_translations.english: from inside an object, container, building, or place

sentences.english: Both Helen’s parents are doctors.
sentences.chinese: 海伦的父母都是医生。

detailed_translations.english: used to talk about two people, things etc together, and emphasize that each is included

sentences.english: They’ve installed the new computer network at last.
sentences.chinese: 他们终于安装了新电脑网络。

sentences.english: Security cameras have been installed in the city centre.
sentences.chinese: 在市中心已安装了一些监控摄像机。

sentences.chinese: 他们从各种途径弄到钱。

sentences.chinese: 我家当时经济窘迫。

sentences.english: The chicken’s nice and crispy – just the way I like it.
sentences.chinese: 这鸡肉很脆，正是我喜欢的口味。

sentences.english: It’s worth thinking how you can improve the way things are.
sentences.chinese: 你应该想想如何让现状变得更好。

detailed_translations.english: a particular state or condition

sentences.chinese: 你给这个会议定了多长时间？

detailed_translations.english: to give someone a particular job or make them responsible for a particular person or thing

sentences.english: The bill was supported by a large majority in the Senate.
sentences.chinese: 这项法案得到参议院绝大多数人的支持。

sentences.english: We strongly support the peace process.
sentences.chinese: 我们大力拥护和平进程。

sentences.chinese: 适合特定年龄组的游戏

sentences.chinese: 酒精对身体影响的具体例子

detailed_translations.english: a specific thing, person, or group is one particular thing, person, or group
particular details

sentences.chinese: 许多人牺牲周末时间，加入了寻找失踪女孩的行动。

sentences.chinese: 参加我们的退休金计划的好处

sentences.chinese: 教会领袖参与了禁止猎狐的运动。

sentences.english: Join the two pieces of wood with strong glue.
sentences.chinese: 用强力胶水把两块木头黏合起来。

sentences.english: Water expands as it freezes.
sentences.chinese: 水结冰时会膨胀。

sentences.english: Sydney’s population expanded rapidly in the 1960s.
sentences.chinese: 20世纪60年代，悉尼的人口迅速增加。

sentences.english: exercises that expand the chest muscles
sentences.chinese: 扩展胸肌的运动

sentences.english: his expanding waistline
sentences.chinese: 他那逐渐增大的腰围

sentences.english: I like your jacket.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢你这件上衣。

sentences.english: I don’t really like classical music.
sentences.chinese: 我不是很喜欢古典音乐。

sentences.english: Do you like this colour?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢这种颜色吗？

sentences.chinese: 我喜欢喝很淡的咖啡。

sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢你生气时的样子。

sentences.english: How do you like living in London (= how much do you like it )?
sentences.chinese: 住在伦敦你感觉怎样？

sentences.chinese: 我很喜欢他们的新专辑。

sentences.chinese: 我们非常喜欢这部影片。

sentences.chinese: 我最喜欢的时间是凉爽的傍晚。

sentences.chinese: 我可不想当单亲家长。

sentences.chinese: 你想喝一杯吗？

trans: n.软磁盘，软盘片,,（词典没有）

sentences.english: They saw the man with a little girl skipping along behind him.
sentences.chinese: 他们看到那个男人身后跟着一个蹦蹦跳跳的小女孩。

detailed_translations.english: to go from one subject to another in no fixed order
a skipping movement

sentences.english: We receive hundreds of job applications each year.
sentences.chinese: 我们每年收到数百封求职信。

sentences.english: I filled in the application form and sent it off.
sentences.chinese: 我填完申请表后把它寄了出去。

sentences.english: You have to submit your application before the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 月底之前必须递交申请。

sentences.english: I’ve put in an application for a transfer.
sentences.chinese: 我已递交了调动申请。

sentences.english: He received a letter saying that his application had been rejected .
sentences.chinese: 他收到一封信，告知他的申请已被拒绝。

sentences.english: It can take a long time for your visa application to be processed .
sentences.chinese: 办理签证申请可能需要很长时间。

sentences.english: The Council is currently reviewing the way it deals with planning applications .
sentences.chinese: 市政会目前正在审查其处理规划申请的方式。

sentences.chinese: 你的申请信昨天收悉，谢谢。

detailed_translations.chinese: 申请， 申请书； 施用， 涂抹； 应用， 实施； 实用性
detailed_translations.english: a formal, usually written, request for something such as a job, place at university, or permission to do something

sentences.english: There has still been no official confirmation of the report.
sentences.chinese: 这则报道仍未得到官方证实。

detailed_translations.english: a statement, document etc that says that something is definitely true

sentences.chinese: 莫里斯问我是否需要帮助。

sentences.english: There were times when I wondered whether or not we would get there.
sentences.chinese: 有时候我也想知道我们能不能做得到。

sentences.english: I didn’t know whether to believe him or not.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道该不该相信他。

sentences.english: The question arose as to whether this behaviour was unlawful.
sentences.chinese: 问题出现了: 这种行为是否不合法？

detailed_translations.english: used when talking about a choice you have to make or about something that is not certain

sentences.english: She was holding a large box.
sentences.chinese: 她提着一只大箱子。

sentences.english: I held the mouse by its tail.
sentences.chinese: 我抓着耗子的尾巴倒提起来。

sentences.english: Employees hold 30% of the shares.
sentences.chinese: 雇员持有30%的股份。

detailed_translations.english: to carry sth; to have sb/sth in your hand, arms, etc.

sentences.english: The door clicked shut behind me.
sentences.chinese: 门在我身后咔嗒一声关上了。

sentences.english: Mother clicked her tongue (= made a short sound to show disapproval ) and sighed.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈咂咂嘴，叹了口气。

sentences.chinese: 埃德蒙弹了个响指示意约翰跟着他。

sentences.chinese: 沃格尔咔嗒一声并拢脚跟，鞠了个躬。
