detailed_translations.chinese: [解剖] 结肠；冒号（用于引语、说明、例证等之前）；科郎（哥斯达黎加货币单位）
detailed_translations.english: the lower part of the  bowels  , in which food is changed into waste matter

sentences.english: Road safety is taught to young children to avoid road accidents.
sentences.chinese: 小孩子受到道路安全知识的教育，以避免交通事故。

sentences.english: It is important to take measures to avoid the risk of fire.
sentences.chinese: 采取措施避免火灾风险很重要。

sentences.english: Alan narrowly avoided an accident.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦险出事故。

detailed_translations.english: to prevent something bad from happening

sentences.english: a temperature range of 72-85˚
sentences.chinese: 72 度到85度之间的温度范围

sentences.english: Even the cheapest property was out of our price range (= too expensive for us ) .
sentences.chinese: 即使是最便宜的房子也超出了我们能承受的价格范围。

sentences.english: There were 120 students whose ages ranged from 10 to 18.
sentences.chinese: 有120名学生，年龄在10至18岁之间。

detailed_translations.english: the limits within which amounts, quantities, ages etc vary
if prices, levels, temperatures etc range from one amount to another, they include both those amounts and anything in between

sentences.english: Tickets are limited and will be allocated to those who apply first.
sentences.chinese: 票数有限，将分配给那些先申请的人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 分配； 分派， 把…拨给
detailed_translations.english: to use something for a particular purpose, give something to a particular person etc, especially after an official decision has been made

sentences.english: Try to express yourself more simply.
sentences.chinese: 尽量把你的意思表达得更简单明了。

sentences.english: To put it simply, the tax cuts mean the average person will be about 3% better off.
sentences.chinese: 简单地说，这次减税意味着普通人的收入将增加 3% 左右。

sentences.english: We had to live very simply on my father’s small salary.
sentences.chinese: 我们只能靠父亲微薄的工资过着非常简朴的生活。

detailed_translations.english: if you say or explain something simply, you say it in a way that is easy for people to understand

sentences.english: I verified the source from which I had that information.
sentences.chinese: 我核实了我获知那条信息的来源。

sentences.english: His statement was verified by several witnesses.
sentences.chinese: 他的说法得到了几位证人的证实。

detailed_translations.english: to discover whether something is correct or true

sentences.english: He felt some guilt over the manner of her death.
sentences.chinese: 她以这种方式死去，他心里有些内疚。

sentences.english: The issue will be resolved in a manner that is fair to both sides.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题将用对双方都公平的方式来解决。

sentences.english: criticism of the manner in which the bishop was appointed
sentences.chinese: 对主教任命方式的批评

sentences.english: She has a calm relaxed manner.
sentences.chinese: 她举止镇定而从容。

sentences.english: Her children all had such good manners.
sentences.chinese: 她的孩子都很有礼貌。

detailed_translations.english: the way in which something is done or happens

sentences.english: Which direction did they go in ?
sentences.chinese: 他们朝哪个方向走了？

sentences.english: A very helpful woman gave me directions to the police station.
sentences.chinese: 一个很热心的妇女给我指了去警察局的路。

sentences.english: Be sure you read the directions before using any piece of equipment.
sentences.chinese: 使用任何设备之前一定要先阅读操作指南。

detailed_translations.english: the way something or someone moves, faces, or is aimed

sentences.english: The front portion of the rocket breaks off.
sentences.chinese: 火箭的前部脱落了。

sentences.english: Do you have any children’s portions?
sentences.chinese: 你们有儿童餐吗？

detailed_translations.english: a part of something larger, especially a part that is different from the other parts

sentences.english: The operation was successful.
sentences.chinese: 手术成功了。

sentences.english: a highly successful (= very successful ) meeting
sentences.chinese: 十分成功的会议

detailed_translations.english: achieving what you wanted, or having the effect or result you intended

sentences.english: He owes me a large sum of money .
sentences.chinese: 他欠我一大笔钱。

sentences.english: You will have to pay the sum of the two sets of costs.
sentences.chinese: 你得支付那两笔费用的总和。

sentences.english: I was good at sums at school.
sentences.chinese: 我上学时擅长算术。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money

sentences.english: Frances achieved very good exam results.
sentences.chinese: 弗朗西丝考试取得了优异成绩。

sentences.english: Wilson has achieved considerable success as an artist.
sentences.chinese: 威尔逊作为一名艺术家成就斐然。

sentences.english: She eventually achieved her goal of becoming a professor.
sentences.chinese: 她终于实现目标，当上了教授。

detailed_translations.english: to successfully complete something or get a good result, especially by working hard

sentences.english: We’ve very much enjoyed working together .
sentences.chinese: 我们在一起工作非常开心。

sentences.english: They’ve decided to spend more time together.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定要花更多时间在一起。

sentences.english: He and my father were at school together.
sentences.chinese: 他和我父亲一起上过学。

sentences.english: Together they went back inside the villa.
sentences.chinese: 他们一起回到了别墅里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一起；同时；相互；连续地；总共
detailed_translations.english: if two or more people do something together, they do it with each other

detailed_translations.chinese: 新潮的；情绪稳定的，做事有效率的

sentences.english: the areas affected by the hurricane
sentences.chinese: 受飓风影响的地区

sentences.english: a disease that affects the central nervous system
sentences.chinese: 影响中枢神经系统的疾病

sentences.english: decisions which affect our lives
sentences.chinese: 影响我们生活的决定

sentences.english: Trading has been adversely affected by the downturn in consumer spending.
sentences.chinese: 贸易受到消费支出回落的不利影响。

sentences.english: We were all deeply affected by her death.
sentences.chinese: 我们都为她的去世深感悲痛。

detailed_translations.english: to do something that produces an effect or change in something or in someone’s situation

sentences.english: Don’t delay – send off for the information now.
sentences.chinese: 别犹豫——即刻去函索取信息。

sentences.english: He delayed his decision on whether to call an election.
sentences.chinese: 在是否宣布举行选举一事上，他推迟作出决定。

detailed_translations.english: to wait until a later time to do something

sentences.english: He knew he could be free in as little as three years.
sentences.chinese: 他知道只要再过三年他就能自由了。

sentences.english: With one leap he was free!
sentences.chinese: 这一跳他就自由了！

sentences.english: He walked out of the courtroom a free man .
sentences.chinese: 他从法庭走出来，成了自由人。

sentences.english: They have called on the government to set all political prisoners free .
sentences.chinese: 他们呼吁政府释放所有政治犯。

sentences.english: He was found not guilty and walked free from the court.
sentences.chinese: 他被判无罪，当庭释放。

sentences.english: The animals are allowed to run free in the park.
sentences.chinese: 那些动物可以在公园里自由奔跑。

sentences.english: I’m free next weekend.
sentences.chinese: 下个周末我有空。

detailed_translations.english: not held, tied up, or kept somewhere as a prisoner

sentences.english: The brakes don’t seem to be working properly.
sentences.chinese: 刹车似乎不正常。

sentences.english: Then he’s not doing his job properly.
sentences.chinese: 那么他没把分内事做好。

sentences.english: Parents should teach their children to behave properly in public.
sentences.chinese: 家长应该教导子女在公共场合要有规有矩。

sentences.english: properly trained staff
sentences.chinese: 训练有素的员工

detailed_translations.english: correctly, or in a way that is considered right

sentences.english: Get me a sandwich – any kind will do.
sentences.chinese: 给我一份三明治，随便哪种都可以。

detailed_translations.english: one of the different types of a person or thing that belong to the same group

sentences.english: Air bags are a standard feature in most new cars.
sentences.chinese: 气囊是大多数新车的标准配置。

sentences.english: Striped tails are a common feature of many animals.
sentences.chinese: 尾巴上有条纹是许多动物的共同特征。

sentences.english: The hotel’s only redeeming features (= things that make it acceptable ) were that it was cheap and near the city centre.
sentences.chinese: 这家旅馆仅有的可取之处就是价格低廉并且靠近市中心。

sentences.english: One of the distinguishing features (= features that are different from other things of the same sort ) of modern banking is its dependence on computers.
sentences.chinese: 现代银行业的显著特征之一就是依赖电脑。

sentences.english: It's a great film and it features a Spanish actor who is going to be a world star within a year.
sentences.chinese: 那是一部精彩的电影，它由一位西班牙演员主演，他一年之内就会成为国际明星。

sentences.english: The hour-long programme will be updated each week and feature highlights from recent games.
sentences.chinese: 这个一小时的节目将每周更新，重点介绍近期比赛的精彩部分。

detailed_translations.chinese: 特征，特色；面貌；特写，专题节目；故事片
detailed_translations.english: a part of something that you notice because it seems important, interesting, or typical
When something such as a film or exhibition features a particular person or thing, they are an important part of it

sentences.english: No one could console her when Peter died.
sentences.chinese: 彼得去世时没人能够安慰她。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel better when they are feeling sad or disappointed
a flat board that contains the controls for a machine, piece of electrical equipment, computer etc

sentences.english: The whole tax system is now operating more efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 现在整个税收制度运作效率更高了。

sentences.english: The new law doesn’t operate in our favour.
sentences.chinese: 这项新法规对我们不利。

sentences.english: The car parks operate a pay-as-you-leave system.
sentences.chinese: 这些停车场按“离开时付费”的模式运作。

sentences.english: The bus company operates a Monday to Saturday service.
sentences.chinese: 这家公共汽车公司周一至周六运营。

detailed_translations.english: if a system, process, or service operates, or if you operate it, it works
to use and control a machine or equipment

sentences.english: The kernel of that message was that peace must not be a source of advantage or disadvantage for anyone.
sentences.chinese: 那一信息的核心是和平绝不应该成为对任何人有利或不利的根源。

detailed_translations.chinese: 核心，要点；[计] 内核；仁；麦粒，谷粒；精髓
detailed_translations.english: the part of a nut or seed inside the shell, or the part inside the stone of some fruits

sentences.english: The test was easy.
sentences.chinese: 考试很容易。

sentences.english: Finishing the task will not be easy.
sentences.chinese: 完成这项任务并不容易。

sentences.english: There must be an easier way to do that.
sentences.chinese: 一定有更容易的方法去做那件事。

sentences.english: instructions that are easy to follow
sentences.chinese: 易于掌握的使用说明

sentences.english: It would have been easy for the team to lose the game.
sentences.chinese: 球队本来是很容易会输掉这场比赛的。

sentences.english: Having you here does make things a lot easier for me.
sentences.chinese: 对我来说，有你在这里事情的确好办多了。

sentences.english: On the whole, Dad has had an easy life.
sentences.chinese: 总而言之，爸爸过着安逸舒适的生活。

sentences.english: You can have an easy time of it now that the kids have all left home.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们都离开了家，你日子可以过得轻松了。

detailed_translations.english: not difficult to do, and not needing much effort

sentences.english: I circle a misplaced modifier and wait as they make the fix.
sentences.chinese: 我会圈出用错的修饰语，等他们自己修改。

sentences.english: A weasel word is a modifier that almost contradicts the claim that is made.
sentences.chinese: “鼬鼠”型的词语是一种修饰语，与广告词的意思几乎是相矛盾的。

detailed_translations.english: a word or group of words that gives additional information about another word. Modifiers can be adjectives (such as ‘fierce’ in ‘the fierce dog’), adverbs (such as ‘loudly’ in ‘the dog barked loudly’), or phrases (such as ‘with a short tail’ in ‘the dog with a short tail’).

sentences.english: Without the right date stamped on it, your ticket will be invalid.
sentences.chinese: 票上若没有加盖正确日期就是废票。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无效的，作废的；无可靠根据的，站不住脚的
detailed_translations.english: a contract, ticket, claim etc that is invalid is not legally or officially acceptable
someone who cannot look after themselves because of illness, old age, or injury

sentences.english: a pattern of dots
sentences.chinese: 圆点图案

sentences.english: She never dots her i’s.
sentences.chinese: 她从来不在i上面加点。

detailed_translations.english: a small round mark or spot
to mark something by putting a dot on it or above it

sentences.english: She had a beautiful face.
sentences.chinese: 她面容秀美。

sentences.english: Her face was white with fear.
sentences.chinese: 她吓得脸煞白。

sentences.english: A big smile spread across his face.
sentences.chinese: 他的脸上绽开了灿烂笑容。

sentences.english: I felt like punching him in the face.
sentences.chinese: 我真想给他脸上来一拳。

sentences.english: The birds build their nests in the rock face.
sentences.chinese: 这些鸟在岩壁上筑巢。

detailed_translations.english: the front part of your head, where your eyes, nose, and mouth are

sentences.english: The gang picked their victims at random.
sentences.chinese: 这帮犯罪分子随意选择对象下手。

sentences.english: The company has introduced random drug testing of its employees.
sentences.chinese: 公司已实行对雇员的随机毒品测试。

detailed_translations.english: without any definite plan, aim, or pattern
happening or chosen without any definite plan, aim, or pattern

sentences.english: What recreational facilities are now available?
sentences.chinese: 什么娱乐设施现在是可用的？

detailed_translations.english: Facilities are buildings, pieces of equipment, or services that are provided for a particular purpose

sentences.english: chapter headings
sentences.chinese: 章节标题

detailed_translations.english: the title written at the beginning of a piece of writing, or at the beginning of part of a book

sentences.english: the series of events that led to the outbreak of war
sentences.chinese: 导致战争爆发的一系列事件

sentences.english: The police are investigating a series of attacks in the area.
sentences.chinese: 警方在调查该地区发生的一连串袭击事件。

sentences.english: There’s been a whole series of accidents on this road.
sentences.chinese: 这条路上发生了一连串的交通事故。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一系列， 连续； 丛书， 连续剧
detailed_translations.english: several events or actions of a similar type that happen one after the other

sentences.english: Each individual leaf on the tree is different.
sentences.chinese: 树上每片叶子都不相同。

sentences.english: the needs of the individual customer
sentences.chinese: 每位顾客的需求

detailed_translations.english: considered separately from other people or things in the same group
a person, considered separately from the rest of the group or society that they live in

sentences.english: He carefully explained the procedure.
sentences.chinese: 他仔细解释了程序。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone about something in a way that is clear or easy to understand

sentences.english: Data can be pasted into word processing documents.
sentences.chinese: 数据可以粘贴到文字处理文件中。

detailed_translations.english: to make words that you have removed or copied appear in a new place on a computer screen

detailed_translations.chinese: 面团，膏；糊状物，[胶粘] 浆糊
detailed_translations.english: a soft thick mixture that can easily be shaped or spread

sentences.english: I had the feeling I wasn’t really welcome.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉到我其实不受欢迎。

sentences.english: I didn’t feel welcome in the club.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我在俱乐部里不受欢迎。

sentences.english: Mary made us very welcome.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽让我们感觉很受欢迎。

sentences.english: We try to make the new students feel welcome.
sentences.chinese: 我们尽量让新同学感到自己是受欢迎的。

detailed_translations.english: if someone is welcome in a place, other people are glad that they are there
the way in which you greet someone when they arrive at a place
to say hello in a friendly way to someone who has just arrived
the way in which you greet someone when they arrive at a place

sentences.english: six months ago
sentences.chinese: 六个月前

sentences.english: She arrived just after six (= six o’clock ) .
sentences.chinese: 她六点刚过就到了。

sentences.english: He learnt to play the violin when he was six (= six years old ) .
sentences.chinese: 他六岁学拉小提琴。

detailed_translations.english: the number 6
the number 6

sentences.english: We arrived early.
sentences.chinese: 我们提早到了。

sentences.english: They must have come home early.
sentences.chinese: 他们肯定提早回到家了。

sentences.english: the early morning sunshine
sentences.chinese: 清晨的阳光

detailed_translations.english: before the usual, arranged, or expected time
in the first part of a period of time, event, or process

sentences.english: I’ve still got a few Christmas presents to wrap up.
sentences.chinese: 我还有一些圣诞礼物要包起来。

detailed_translations.english: to put paper or cloth over something to cover it
a piece of thick cloth that a woman wears around her shoulders

sentences.english: the blue waters of the lake
sentences.chinese: 蓝蓝的湖水

sentences.english: She nearly always dresses in blue.
sentences.chinese: 她几乎总是穿蓝色的衣服。

detailed_translations.english: having the colour of the sky or the sea on a fine day
the colour of the sky or the sea on a fine day

sentences.english: You’ll have to join the queue.
sentences.chinese: 你得排队。

sentences.english: Some of the people queuing for tickets had been there since dawn.
sentences.chinese: 购票队伍中有些人天刚亮就来了。

detailed_translations.english: a line of people waiting to enter a building, buy something etc, or a line of vehicles waiting to move
to form or join a line of people or vehicles waiting to do something or go somewhere

sentences.english: Will you stop interrupting me!
sentences.chinese: 别打断我的话！

sentences.english: Sorry to interrupt, but I need to ask you to come downstairs.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉打扰了，我得请你下楼来。

detailed_translations.english: to stop someone from continuing what they are saying or doing by suddenly speaking to them, making a noise etc

sentences.english: The boys showed a complete lack of respect for authority.
sentences.chinese: 这些男孩子根本无视权威。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of admiring someone or what they do, especially because of their personal qualities, knowledge, or skills
to admire someone because they have high standards and good qualities such as fairness and honesty

sentences.english: Heart disease is one of the commonest causes of death.
sentences.chinese: 心脏病是最常见的死因之一。

sentences.english: They share a common interest in photography.
sentences.chinese: 他们在摄影方面兴趣相投。

detailed_translations.english: happening often and to many people or in many places

sentences.english: Because she included the hyphen (-), nothing else is required; because 1=1 is always true, she will be able to log in successfully.
sentences.chinese: 由于她包含了连字号（-），所以任何其他东西都不需要；由于 1=1 总是为真，所以她将能够成功登录。

detailed_translations.english: a short written or printed line (-) that joins words or  syllables

sentences.english: Keep the questions in the same serial order .
sentences.chinese: 让这些问题保持原来的顺序。

detailed_translations.chinese: 连续的；连载的；分期偿还的
detailed_translations.english: arranged or happening one after the other in the correct order

detailed_translations.chinese: 电视连续剧；[图情] 期刊；连载小说
detailed_translations.english: a story that is broadcast or printed in several separate parts on television, in a magazine etc

sentences.english: You have the right to retain possession of the goods.
sentences.chinese: 你有权保留这些物品。

sentences.english: The state wants to retain control of food imports.
sentences.chinese: 政府想保留对食品进口的控制权。

detailed_translations.english: to keep something or continue to have something

sentences.english: The worst part of the setup is the poor instruction manual.
sentences.chinese: 安装过程中最糟糕的部分就是差劲的操作手册。

detailed_translations.english: The setup of computer hardware or software is the process of installing it and making it ready to use

sentences.english: The lake had frozen overnight.
sentences.chinese: 湖上一夜之间就结了冰。

detailed_translations.english: if a liquid or something wet freezes or is frozen, it becomes hard and solid because the temperature is very cold
if a liquid or something wet freezes or is frozen, it becomes hard and solid because the temperature is very cold

sentences.english: Oddly enough, that is precisely what I intend.
sentences.chinese: 说也奇怪， 那正是我的打算。

sentences.english: They intend to be an army of light against the onslaught of darkness.
sentences.chinese: 他们打算成为一支光明之师对抗黑暗军团的猛烈进攻。

sentences.english: She told the court she would give a full explanation of the prosecution's decision on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 她告诉法庭她将在星期一就控方的决定做出详尽的解释。

detailed_translations.english: a statement, fact, or situation that tells you why sth happened; a reason given for sth

sentences.english: I felt certain that I’d passed the test.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉自己肯定通过这次测验了。

sentences.english: Many people look certain to lose their jobs.
sentences.chinese: 许多人看来肯定要失业了。

detailed_translations.english: confident and sure, without any doubts

sentences.english: Doctors have tried zapping tumors with high-voltage radiation.
sentences.chinese: 医生试过用高压辐射消除肿瘤。

sentences.english: The laser weapons are designed to zap enemy missiles.
sentences.chinese: 这些激光武器是用来摧毁敌军导弹的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 毁坏；打击；快速度换频道
detailed_translations.english: to quickly attack or destroy something, especially using a beam of electricity

sentences.english: an archive of the writer’s unpublished work
sentences.chinese: 那位作家未发表作品的档案

sentences.english: The Edinburgh train will depart from platform six.
sentences.chinese: 开往爱丁堡的火车将从六号站台发车。

sentences.chinese: 他按了一下红色报警信号钮，检查一下它是开著的还是关著的。

to make a sound or action in order to give information or tell someone to do something

sentences.chinese: 他把发动机拆开了。

sentences.chinese: 我完全同意，他的话属实。

sentences.chinese: 我向来不喜欢长距离散步，尤其在冬天。

sentences.english: Women usually live longer than men.
sentences.chinese: 女人通常比男人长寿。

sentences.chinese: 通常我都穿黑色、灰色或者棕色的衣服。

sentences.chinese: 很重要的会议

sentences.english: Happiness is more important than money.
sentences.chinese: 快乐比金钱更重要。

sentences.chinese: 本书分为六部分。

sentences.chinese: 我昨天没能去买东西，所以今天我必须去。

detailed_translations.english: on the day that is happening now

sentences.chinese: 他虽然经验最少，却是最出色的老师。

sentences.chinese: 总统否决了议案，而参议院因一票之差未能推翻他的否决。

sentences.chinese: 如果你累了，我们就停下来歇一会儿。

detailed_translations.english: a period of time when you are not doing anything tiring and you can relax or sleep

detailed_translations.english: a big building where people wait to get onto planes, buses, or ships, or where goods are loaded

sentences.chinese: 请你帮我开门好吗？

sentences.chinese: 我的护照下周就到期了。

sentences.chinese: 然后，她突然很坚决地站了起来。

sentences.english: She made a resolution to visit her relatives more often.
sentences.chinese: 她决定要多走走亲戚。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being resolute or determined

sentences.english: local hospital

sentences.english: local residents

sentences.english: a local infection

detailed_translations.english: relating to the particular area you live in, or the area you are talking about

sentences.english: Edit the file, and add the semicolon, if necessary.
sentences.chinese: 编辑该文件并添加分号（如果有必要）。

sentences.english: The semicolon is an or operator between each function definition.
sentences.chinese: 分号是每个函数定义之间的 “或” 操作符。

sentences.english: If you put a comma where that semicolon is, you will have committed a "comma splice," which is a very nasty grammar error indeed.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在这个应该放分号的地方用了逗号，你便犯了“逗号粘连”的错误，这实在是一个非常讨厌的语法错误。

detailed_translations.english: a  punctuation mark  (;) used to separate different parts of a sentence or list

sentences.english: He made some highly critical remarks.
sentences.chinese: 他发表了一些严厉的批判性言论。

detailed_translations.english: if you are critical, you criticize someone or something

sentences.english: one of our regional managers
sentences.chinese: 我们的一位地区经理

sentences.english: a middle manager in a computer company
sentences.chinese: 一家计算机公司的中层管理人员

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to manage part or all of a company or other organization

sentences.english: the country’s manufacturing capability
sentences.chinese: 该国的生产能力

sentences.english: I can speak French, but simultaneous translation is beyond my capabilities (= too difficult ).
sentences.chinese: 我能讲法语，但是同声传译我做不了。

detailed_translations.english: the natural ability, skill, or power that makes a machine, person, or organization able to do something, especially something difficult

sentences.english: an affected laugh
sentences.chinese: 假笑

detailed_translations.english: not sincere or natural

detailed_translations.chinese: 影响；假装；使…感动（affect的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.english: You must ink over your signature. Pencil writing is not allowed.
sentences.chinese: 你必须把签名用墨水描一下。铅笔书写是不允许的。

sentences.english: As a concession to his reasonable demand, the doctor allowed him to work.
sentences.chinese: 医生向他的合理要求让步了， 允许他工作。

sentences.english: The children are allowed to watch TV after school.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们被允许在放学后看电视。

sentences.english: Smoking will not be allowed.

sentences.chinese: 地中海沿岸的国家

sentences.english: ...the European and Arab countries bordering the Mediterranean.
sentences.chinese: …地中海沿岸的欧洲国家和阿拉伯国家。

detailed_translations.english: if one country, state, or area borders another, it is next to it and shares a border with it
a band along or around the edge of something such as a picture or piece of material
A country that borders another country, a sea, or a river is next to it

sentences.english: a large arms cache
sentences.chinese: 隐藏的大批武器

detailed_translations.chinese: 电脑高速缓冲存储器；贮存物；隐藏处
detailed_translations.english: a number of things that have been hidden, especially weapons, or the place where they have been hidden
to hide something in a secret place, especially weapons

sentences.english: church bells
sentences.chinese: 教堂的钟

detailed_translations.english: a piece of electrical equipment that makes a ringing sound, used as a signal or to get someone’s attention

sentences.chinese: 孩子们在互相追逐嬉闹。

sentences.english: He’s learning to play the piano.
sentences.chinese: 他在学习弹钢琴。

detailed_translations.english: when children play, they do things that they enjoy, often with other people or with toys

sentences.english: We need to get this finished as quickly as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须尽快完成此事。

sentences.english: Kids grow up so quickly these days.
sentences.chinese: 现在的孩子长得真快啊。

detailed_translations.english: fast

sentences.english: Does this answer your requirements?
sentences.chinese: 这个符合你的要求吗？

detailed_translations.english: to be suitable for sth; to match sth

sentences.english: Mr Kobayashi was chosen to represent the company at the conference.
sentences.chinese: 小林先生被选中代表公司出席会议。

detailed_translations.english: to officially speak or take action for another person or group of people

sentences.english: There’s a big difference between knowing that something is true, and being able to prove it.
sentences.chinese: 知道什么正确与能够证明它正确，这之间有很大的不同。

sentences.english: There's not much difference in price between the two computers.
sentences.chinese: 这两种计算机价格上没有多大的差别。

sentences.english: We have our differences , but she's still my sister.
sentences.chinese: 我们之间虽然不和，但她仍旧是我的妹妹。

sentences.english: The project aims to provide an analysis of children’s emotions.
sentences.chinese: 该计划旨在对儿童情绪作出分析。

sentences.english: a three-year research project
sentences.chinese: 一项为期三年的研究计划

sentences.english: The scheme will now be extended after a successful pilot project (= a small trial to test if an idea will be successful ) .
sentences.chinese: 试行成功后，该方案现在将得到推广。

sentences.english: The project is funded by Wellcome plc.
sentences.chinese: 这个项目由威康公司资助。

sentences.english: a project manager

sentences.english: a geography project
sentences.chinese: 一个地理课题

detailed_translations.english: a carefully planned piece of work to get information about something, to build something, to improve something etc

sentences.chinese: 她一直感到身上疼痛。

sentences.english: people with severe physical disabilities
sentences.chinese: 身体重度残疾的人

sentences.english: Don’t be put off by his physical appearance .
sentences.chinese: 别因为他的外貌讨厌他。

sentences.chinese: 他对健身着了迷。

detailed_translations.english: related to someone’s body rather than their mind or emotions

sentences.english: If I have to stay late at work tonight, it won’t matter because we can go out another night.
sentences.chinese: 如果今晚我必须工作到很晚的话，那也没关系，我们可以改天晚上再出去。

sentences.chinese: 我怎么想重要吗？

sentences.chinese: 你觉得茶杯与杯托不相配要紧吗？

sentences.chinese: 以重大问题为竞选议题

sentences.english: Money was the only thing that mattered to him.
sentences.chinese: 对他来说，钱是唯一重要的东西。

sentences.english: I don’t care what it looks like – what matters is that it works.
sentences.chinese: 我不在乎外观——要紧的是它要管用。

sentences.chinese: 最终她和她所爱的男人在一起了，其他都无关紧要。

sentences.english: She said very little during the meal. Not that it mattered (= it was not important ) .
sentences.chinese: 她吃饭时话很少，那倒无所谓。

detailed_translations.english: to be important, especially to be important to you, or to have an effect on what happens

sentences.english: The governor announced a new plan to reduce crime.
sentences.chinese: 州长宣布了一项降低犯罪率的新计划。

sentences.english: The helmet law should reduce injuries in motorcycle accidents.
sentences.chinese: 头盔法的实施应该能减少摩托车事故的受伤率。

sentences.english: Small businesses will need to reduce costs in order to survive.
sentences.chinese: 小企业要想生存必须削减成本。

detailed_translations.english: to make something smaller or less in size, amount, or price

sentences.english: The publishers planned to produce the journal on a weekly basis.
sentences.chinese: 出版社计划将这份杂志做成周刊。

detailed_translations.english: a person or company whose business is to arrange the writing, production, and sale of books, newspapers etc

sentences.english: Pete was trimming the lawn around the roses.
sentences.chinese: 皮特在修剪玫瑰丛周围的草坪。

sentences.english: I have my hair trimmed every six weeks.
sentences.chinese: 我每六周剪一次头发。

detailed_translations.english: to make something look neater by cutting small pieces off it
when something is cut to make it look neater
neat and well cared for

sentences.chinese: 德国队在比赛半场时换上一名替补队员。

sentences.english: substitute goalkeeper

to use something new or diffe-rent instead of something else

sentences.chinese: 帮助残障儿童父母的援助团

sentences.chinese: 严重残疾的小儿麻痺症病人

sentences.chinese: 教有学习障碍的儿童的教师

detailed_translations.english: someone who is disabled cannot use a part of their body properly, or cannot learn easily

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…失去能力（disable的过去分词）

sentences.chinese: 欧文最新的书

sentences.english: recent research into the causes of cancer
sentences.chinese: 近来对致癌原因的研究

sentences.english: the recent past
sentences.chinese: 不久前

detailed_translations.english: having happened or started only a short time ago

sentences.english: At least something positive has come out of the situation.
sentences.chinese: 至少这个情况也产生了一些积极的东西。

sentences.english: Write down all the positive things about your life.
sentences.chinese: 记下生活中所有好的事情。

sentences.english: The rural environment was having a positive effect on the children’s health.
sentences.chinese: 乡村环境对孩子们的健康有好处。

sentences.english: It’s been a very positive experience for her.
sentences.chinese: 那对她来说是一次非常有益的经历。

sentences.english: TV can be a positive influence .
sentences.chinese: 电视也会有好的影响。

sentences.english: the positive contribution to the community made by many older people
sentences.chinese: 许多老年人为社区做出的积极贡献

sentences.chinese: 日子过得不容易，不过从好的方面看，我的身体状况还不错。

sentences.chinese: 应该从更正面的角度来描绘女性。

detailed_translations.english: good or useful

sentences.chinese: 直升机已经升级并且装上现代化设备。

sentences.english: In this instance I think she was mistaken.
sentences.chinese: 在这一点上我认为她弄错了。

sentences.english: When did the accident happen?
sentences.chinese: 事故什么时候发生的？

sentences.english: It’s impossible to predict what will happen next.
sentences.chinese: 不可能预测接下来会发生什么。

sentences.chinese: 她继续干，似乎什么都未曾发生。

sentences.english: This was bound to happen sooner or later.
sentences.chinese: 这事注定早晚会发生。

sentences.chinese: 这种事一直在发生。

sentences.english: As it happens, I know someone who might be able to help.
sentences.chinese: 真巧，我正好认识一个人，这个人也许帮得上忙。

sentences.chinese: 我们碰巧发现我们有个共同的朋友。

sentences.chinese: 你未来有什么打算？

sentences.english: The islands should have the right to decide their own future.
sentences.chinese: 这些岛屿应当有权决定自己的未来。

sentences.english: a leader who will shape the organization’s future
sentences.chinese: 将决定该组织未来的一位领导者

detailed_translations.english: the time after the present

sentences.chinese: 你现在不能打电话给她，都过午夜了！

sentences.english: By the time he arrived, it was well past midnight (= after midnight ) .
sentences.chinese: 他到的时候早已经是后半夜了。

sentences.english: He’s gone for a midnight swim.
sentences.chinese: 他深更半夜去游泳了。

detailed_translations.english: 12 o’clock at night

sentences.english: Two heart attacks in a year. It hasn’t stopped him smoking, though.
sentences.chinese: 一年里心脏病发作了两次，可是那也没让他把烟戒掉。

sentences.english: It sounds like a lot of fun. Isn’t it rather risky though?
sentences.chinese: 听上去很有趣。可是这不是也很危险吗？

detailed_translations.english: used after adding a fact, opinion, or question which seems surprising after what you have just said, or which makes what you have just said seem less true
used to introduce a statement that makes the main statement coming after it seem surprising, unlikely, or unexpected

sentences.english: He can neither read nor write (= he cannot read or write ).
sentences.chinese: 他既不会读也不会写。

sentences.english: Hilary was neither shocked nor surprised by the news.
sentences.chinese: 希拉里对这个消息既没有感到震惊，也没有觉得意外。

sentences.english: Neither Matt nor Julie said anything.
sentences.chinese: 马特和朱莉都没有说什么。

sentences.english: ‘I don’t want to go.’ ‘Nor do I.’
sentences.chinese: “我不想去。”“我也不想去。”

detailed_translations.english: used when mentioning two things that are not true or do not happen

sentences.english: He slid open the door of the glass cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 他滑开玻璃柜的门。

detailed_translations.english: to move smoothly over a surface while continuing to touch it, or to make something move in this way
to move smoothly over a surface while continuing to touch it, or to make something move in this way
a large structure with steps leading to the top of a long sloping surface which children can slide down

sentences.english: The disease causes pregnant animals to abort.
sentences.chinese: 这种疾病会导致怀孕的动物流产。

detailed_translations.chinese: 流产；堕胎；夭折；发育不全
detailed_translations.english: to deliberately end a  pregnancy  when the baby is still too young to live

sentences.english: The cats jumped down and came to meet us.
sentences.chinese: 这些猫跳下来，过来迎接我们。

detailed_translations.english: to let yourself drop from a place that is above the ground
to let yourself drop from a place that is above the ground

sentences.english: a large organization with offices throughout the world
sentences.chinese: 在世界各地都设有办事处的一家大型机构

sentences.english: The disease spread rapidly throughout Europe.
sentences.chinese: 疾病迅速在整个欧洲蔓延开来。

sentences.english: The house is in excellent condition, with fitted carpets throughout.
sentences.chinese: 这幢房子状况极好，全部铺着地毯。

sentences.english: We are open every weekend throughout the year.
sentences.chinese: 我们全年每个周末都对外开放。

detailed_translations.english: in every part of a particular area, place etc
during all of a particular period, from the beginning to the end

sentences.english: We flew to Athens via Paris.
sentences.chinese: 我们经由巴黎飞往雅典。

detailed_translations.english: travelling through a place on the way to another place

sentences.english: The girl quickly disappeared among the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 女孩转眼消失在人群中。

sentences.english: I could hear voices coming from somewhere among the bushes.
sentences.chinese: 我能听到灌木丛中某个地方传来说话的声音。

sentences.english: We walked among the chestnut woods on the mountain slopes.
sentences.chinese: 我们走在山坡上的栗树林中。

sentences.english: She began rummaging among the books on her desk.
sentences.chinese: 她开始在桌子上的一堆书中乱翻起来。

detailed_translations.english: in or through the middle of a group of people or things

sentences.english: Neither Oleg’s mother nor his father spoke English.
sentences.chinese: 奥列格的父母都不会说英语。

sentences.english: The equipment is neither accurate nor safe.
sentences.chinese: 这台设备既不精确，也不安全。

detailed_translations.english: used when mentioning two things that are not true or possible
used to show that a negative statement is also true about another person or thing

sentences.english: He pulled off layer upon layer of clothing (= many layers of clothing ).
sentences.chinese: 他把衣服一件件地脱掉。

detailed_translations.english: an amount or piece of a material or substance that covers a surface or that is between two other things

sentences.english: The sound of gunfire made the crowd scatter in all directions.
sentences.chinese: 枪声使人群四散奔逃。

detailed_translations.english: if a group of people or animals scatter, or if something scatters them, they move quickly in different directions

sentences.english: My attention wasn’t really on the game.
sentences.chinese: 我的注意力其实不在比赛上。

sentences.english: She tried to pay attention to what he was saying.
sentences.chinese: 她尽量注意听他说话。

sentences.english: If you paid more attention in class, you might actually learn something!
sentences.chinese: 要是你上课更认真些，也许能实实在在地学到些东西！

sentences.english: Scott sat down at his desk and turned his attention to the file he had in front of him.
sentences.chinese: 斯科特在自己的办公桌前坐下，将注意力转向面前的文件。

sentences.english: As a society we need to give more attention to the needs of older people.
sentences.chinese: 生活在同一社会里，我们得更加关注长者的需求。

sentences.english: Now he’s gone, I can give you my undivided attention .
sentences.chinese: 现在他已经走了，我可以把全部注意力都放在你身上。

sentences.english: This game is fun and is sure to keep the attention of any young student.
sentences.chinese: 这个游戏很有趣，一定能使年幼学生保持注意力。

sentences.english: They listened to the speech with close attention .
sentences.chinese: 他们很认真地听演讲。

sentences.english: Attention to detail is essential in this job.
sentences.chinese: 关注细节是这份工作所必需的。

sentences.english: During the lecture Sarah’s attention began to wander .
sentences.chinese: 上课时，萨拉开始走神了。

detailed_translations.english: when you carefully listen to, look at, or think about someone or something

sentences.english: a teachers’ convention
sentences.chinese: 教师大会

sentences.english: the city’s new convention center
sentences.chinese: 该市新建的会议中心

sentences.english: a convention for science fiction fans
sentences.chinese: 科幻小说迷的集会

detailed_translations.english: a large formal meeting for people who belong to the same profession or organization or who have the same interests

sentences.english: Internet connections through conventional phone lines are fairly slow.
sentences.chinese: 通过传统的电话线来连接因特网速度很慢。

sentences.english: Bake for 20 minutes in a conventional oven; 8 in a microwave.
sentences.chinese: 在传统的烤炉中烘烤20分钟，在微波炉里则烤8分钟。

detailed_translations.english: a conventional method, product, practice etc has been used for a long time and is considered the usual type

sentences.english: I don’t have the right tools to start fiddling around with the engine.
sentences.chinese: 我没有合适的工具来摆弄发动机。

sentences.english: a shop selling garden tools
sentences.chinese: 出售园艺工具的商店

detailed_translations.chinese: 工具，用具；器械，机床；手段
detailed_translations.english: something that you hold in your hand and use to do a particular job

detailed_translations.english: including or involving a large variety of different people, things, or situations
opening or spreading as much as possible

sentences.english: Many people regard Beethoven’s fifth symphony as his finest work.
sentences.chinese: 很多人认为贝多芬的第五交响曲是他最杰出的作品。

sentences.english: He’s a very fine player.
sentences.chinese: 他是个很优秀的选手。

sentences.english: It’s a fine idea.
sentences.chinese: 这是个很妙的主意。

sentences.english: Hatfield House is a fine example of Jacobean architecture.
sentences.chinese: 哈特菲尔德宅第是英王詹姆斯一世时期建筑的典范。

sentences.english: The restaurant was chosen for its good food and fine wines .
sentences.chinese: 这家餐厅因其美酒佳肴而入选。

detailed_translations.english: very good or of a very high standard

sentences.english: He’s been a constant source of worry .
sentences.chinese: 他总是让人担心。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being anxious about something

sentences.english: Things have changed somewhat since then.
sentences.chinese: 从那时候起，情况就有些不一样了。

detailed_translations.english: more than a little but not very

sentences.chinese: 我们得安静点，免得吵醒宝宝。

sentences.english: It’s a nice car. The engine’s really quiet.
sentences.chinese: 这车真好，发动机声音很小。

sentences.english: I’ll be as quiet as a mouse (= very quiet ).
sentences.chinese: 我会像老鼠一样悄无声息的。

sentences.english: It was a Sunday, about three o’clock, and the streets were quiet.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个星期天，三点钟左右，街上一片寂静。

detailed_translations.english: not making much noise, or making no noise at all

sentences.english: Anorexics may overeat before purging themselves or vomiting.
sentences.chinese: 厌食症患者会在暴饮暴食之后服用泻药或者把吃下去的东西呕吐出来。

detailed_translations.english: to take a substance that makes your  bowel s  empty
a substance used to make you empty your  bowel s

sentences.english: ...a flat, square wristwatch with classic Roman numerals.
sentences.chinese: ...一块扁平、有标准罗马数字的正方形手表。

detailed_translations.english: a written sign such as 1, 2, or 3 that represents a number

sentences.english: Letting taxes rise abruptly would hurt not only the recovery but also whichever party the electorate ended up blaming.
sentences.chinese: 突然的增税不但会妨害经济复苏，而且无论哪个政党这样做都会受到选民指责。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无论哪个， 无论哪些

sentences.english: She paid for her purchases and left.
sentences.chinese: 她付钱买好东西离开了。

sentences.english: I enclose my receipt as proof of purchase .
sentences.chinese: 我附上小票作为购物凭证。

sentences.english: She made two purchases from my stall.
sentences.chinese: 她从我的货摊上买了两样东西。

sentences.english: You can purchase insurance online.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在网上买保险。

detailed_translations.english: something you buy, or the act of buying it
to buy something

sentences.english: ‘He looked angry.’ ‘ I don’t care !’
sentences.chinese: “他好像很生气。”“我不管！”

sentences.english: She felt that nobody cared.
sentences.chinese: 她觉得没有人在乎。

sentences.english: The picture had been drawn with great care.
sentences.chinese: 这幅图画得非常用心。

detailed_translations.english: to think that something is important, so that you are interested in it, worried about it etc
when you are careful to avoid damage, mistakes etc

sentences.english: Do you mind if I watch?
sentences.chinese: 你介意我看着吗？

sentences.english: We sat and watched the sunset.
sentences.chinese: 我们坐下来看日落。

sentences.english: Ruth could not bear to watch her parents arguing.
sentences.chinese: 露丝看不得父母争吵。

sentences.english: Most parents don’t know what their kids are watching on TV.
sentences.chinese: 大多数父母不知道自己的孩子都在看什么电视节目。

detailed_translations.english: to look at someone or something for a period of time, paying attention to what is happening
a small clock that you wear on your wrist or keep in your pocket

sentences.english: We always endeavor to please our customers.
sentences.chinese: 我们总是竭尽全力让顾客满意。

sentences.english: an outstanding example of human endeavor
sentences.chinese: 人类努力进取的突出例证

detailed_translations.english: to try very hard
an attempt to do something new or difficult

sentences.english: There is a mismatch between the skills offered by people and the skills needed by industry.
sentences.chinese: 人们所提供的技能和行业所需要的技能并不匹配。

detailed_translations.english: a combination of things or people that do not work well together or are not suitable for each other

sentences.english: We'll ship your order to the address we print on your cheques.
sentences.chinese: 我们将把你预订的货物送到我们印在你单据上的地址。

detailed_translations.english: to send goods somewhere by ship, plane, truck etc
a large boat used for carrying people or goods across the sea

sentences.english: Lines AB and CD are parallel. AB
sentences.chinese: 线与CD线平行。

sentences.english: two parallel roads
sentences.chinese: 两条平行的道路

sentences.english: Take the road running parallel to the main road just after the village.
sentences.chinese: 过那个村子后走与主干道平行的路。

detailed_translations.chinese: 并列的，平行的；类似的；对应的；并联的
detailed_translations.english: two lines, paths etc that are parallel to each other are the same distance apart along their whole length

detailed_translations.chinese: 可相比拟的事物，相似处；平行线，平行面；纬线
detailed_translations.english: a relationship or similarity between two things, especially things that exist or happen in different places or at different times

detailed_translations.chinese: 与…相似， 与… 相当， 比得上
detailed_translations.english: if one thing parallels another, they happen at the same time or are similar, and seem to be related

sentences.english: She was stopped at customs and questioned.
sentences.chinese: 她在海关被叫住接受问话。

sentences.english: It took ages to clear customs (= be allowed through customs ) but then we were out of the airport quite quickly.
sentences.chinese: 过海关花了很长时间，不过出机场倒是很快。

sentences.english: You won’t be able to take that through customs.
sentences.chinese: 你带着那东西过不了海关的。

detailed_translations.english: the place where your bags are checked for illegal goods when you go into a country

sentences.english: letters of congratulation
sentences.chinese: 祝贺信

sentences.english: Give Oscar my congratulations.
sentences.chinese: 请向奥斯卡转达我的祝贺。

detailed_translations.english: when you tell someone that you are happy because they have achieved something or because something nice has happened to them

sentences.english: the protection of the environment
sentences.chinese: 环境保护

detailed_translations.english: when someone or something is protected

sentences.english: a glass bowl
sentences.chinese: 玻璃碗

sentences.english: a piece of broken glass
sentences.chinese: 一块碎玻璃片

sentences.english: the cathedral’s stained glass windows
sentences.chinese: 教堂的彩色玻璃窗

sentences.english: Nigel raised his glass in a toast to his son.
sentences.chinese: 奈杰尔举杯向儿子祝酒。

detailed_translations.english: a transparent solid substance used for making windows, bottles etc

sentences.english: Weather patterns have changed in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 气候模式近年已经发生了变化。

sentences.english: A general pattern began to emerge .
sentences.chinese: 一个总体模式开始显现。

sentences.english: Their descriptions seemed to follow a set pattern (= always develop in the same way ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的描述似乎依据固定的模式。

sentences.english: His behavior fits a pattern of violent acts.
sentences.chinese: 他的举动符合暴力行为的模式。

sentences.english: a dress pattern
sentences.chinese: 连衣裙的纸样

detailed_translations.english: the regular way in which something happens, develops, or is done

sentences.english: Have you insured the contents of your home?
sentences.chinese: 你给家庭财产投保了吗？

sentences.english: facilities to insure the safety of cyclists
sentences.chinese: 确保骑车人安全的设施

detailed_translations.english: to buy insurance so that you will receive money if something bad happens to you, your family, your possessions etc

sentences.english: a car factory
sentences.chinese: 汽车制造厂

sentences.english: factory workers
sentences.chinese: 工厂工人

detailed_translations.english: a building or group of buildings in which goods are produced in large quantities, using machines

sentences.english: ...writing implements.
sentences.chinese: …书写用具。

sentences.english: We have decided to implement the committee’s recommendations in full.
sentences.chinese: 我们已决定全面实施委员会提出的建议。

detailed_translations.english: a tool, especially one used for outdoor physical work
to take action or make changes that you have officially decided should happen

sentences.english: Lou lifted the box easily, without using much effort.
sentences.chinese: 卢没费多大力气就把箱子搬了起来。

sentences.english: Frank put a lot of effort into the party.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克办这次聚会花了不少精力。

sentences.english: Learning to speak another language takes effort.
sentences.chinese: 学说外语要下功夫。

sentences.english: I'm afraid this essay is a poor effort.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉，这篇文章写得不好。

detailed_translations.english: the physical or mental energy that you need to do sth; sth that takes a lot of energy

sentences.english: the workers’ revolution
sentences.chinese: 工人阶级革命

detailed_translations.english: the members of the  working class

sentences.english: The prime minister promised farmers a new deal (= a new and fairer system ) .
sentences.chinese: 首相向农民保证推行一项新政策。

detailed_translations.english: treatment of a particular type that is given or received

sentences.english: It is not within my power (= I am unable or not in a position) to help you.
sentences.chinese: 我是爱莫能助啊。

sentences.english: The ship was helpless against the power of the storm.
sentences.chinese: 那艘船只能任凭强大的暴风雨肆虐。

sentences.english: The Secretary of State has the power to approve the proposals.
sentences.chinese: 国务卿有权批准这些提议。

sentences.english: 4 to the power of 3 is 4^3 (= 4 × 4 × 4 = 64).
sentences.chinese: 4的3次方是4^3。

detailed_translations.english: the ability or right to control people or events

sentences.chinese: 他们找接替的人费了很大劲

sentences.english: If you have any difficulties, give me a call.
sentences.chinese: 如果你遇到困难，就给我打电话。

sentences.chinese: 她很快就因债务陷入了困境。

sentences.chinese: 我已经没有了胃口。

sentences.english: Try not to lose heart (= become sad and hopeless ) - there are plenty of other jobs.
sentences.chinese: 不要灰心―还有很多其他的工作。

sentences.chinese: 救护车赶到时，道格拉斯已经失去知觉。

sentences.english: I followed her on foot, but lost her in the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 我走在她后面，可是在人群中跟丢了。

sentences.english: Klinger lost his seat in the election.
sentences.chinese: 克林格在选举中失去了他的席位。

detailed_translations.english: to stop having a particular attitude, quality, ability etc, or to gradually have less of it

sentences.chinese: 一本关于魔法的书

sentences.english: a magic sword
sentences.chinese: 一把魔剑

the power to make impossible things happen by saying special words or doing special actions

sentences.chinese: 专利品牌杀虫剂

sentences.english: proprietary software products
sentences.chinese: 专利软件产品

detailed_translations.chinese: 所有的；专利的；私人拥有的
detailed_translations.english: a proprietary product is one that is sold under a  trade name

sentences.english: I don't think people are really aware of just how much it costs.
sentences.chinese: 我认为人们并不真正明白这要花多少钱。

sentences.english: Were you aware that something was wrong?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有意识到已经出了问题？

detailed_translations.english: knowing or realizing sth

sentences.chinese: 为掩盖事实作了很多尝试。

sentences.english: The two leaders have worked together on numerous occasions.
sentences.chinese: 那两位领导人已经多次合作。

sentences.chinese: 但是他已经能清楚地说元音并开始学习词汇。

sentences.chinese: 随着中世纪英语的泯灭，发音突然发生了很大的变化（元音大推移），元音的发音越来越短。

sentences.english: The successful applicant will be working closely with our international staff.
sentences.chinese: 被录用者将与我们的国际员工紧密合作。

sentences.english: lightning, followed closely by thunder
sentences.chinese: 闪电，紧跟着是雷鸣

sentences.english: We were so closely packed in the elevator I could hardly move.
sentences.chinese: 电梯里人挨着人，我几乎动弹不得。

detailed_translations.english: to a very great degree

sentences.chinese: 他传球准确无误。

sentences.english: They questioned the accuracy of the information in the file.
sentences.chinese: 他们怀疑档案中信息的正确性。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being exact or correct; the ability to do sth skilfully without making mistakes

sentences.english: traditional Italian cooking
sentences.chinese: 传统的意大利烹饪

sentences.english: a traditional Irish folk song
sentences.chinese: 传统的爱尔兰民歌

sentences.english: a traditional method of brewing beer
sentences.chinese: 传统的啤酒酿造方法

detailed_translations.english: being part of the traditions of a country or group of people

sentences.english: What happens to systems not under the control of the synchronization service?
sentences.chinese: 系统不在同步服务的控制范围内，会发生什么？

sentences.english: This is a good alternative if your objective is to eliminate synchronization.
sentences.chinese: 如果您的目标是消除同步，则这将是一个很好的选择。

sentences.english: My next step is to wire them up using a common channel as a shared synchronization mechanism and then kick each one off.
sentences.chinese: 下一步就是使用一个用作共享同步机制的公共通道把它们联系在一起，然后从中剔除一个进程。

sentences.chinese: 玻璃碎片

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of something that has broken off or that comes from something larger
to break something, or be broken into a lot of small separate parts – used to show disapproval

sentences.english: Our primary concern is to provide the refugees with food and health care.
sentences.chinese: 我们的头等大事是向难民提供食品和医疗。

sentences.english: Many of the villagers rely on fishing as their primary source of income.
sentences.chinese: 很多村民以打鱼作为他们的主要收入来源。

sentences.english: Personal safety is of primary importance .
sentences.chinese: 人身安全至关重要。

detailed_translations.chinese: 首要的， 主要的； 基本的； 最初的， 初级的
detailed_translations.english: most important

sentences.english: Drive safely!
sentences.chinese: 安全行驶！

sentences.english: I think we can safely assume that she will pass the exam.
sentences.chinese: 我想我们可以确信她会通过考试。

detailed_translations.english: in a way that is safe

sentences.english: Regular exercise is a good habit.
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼是个好习惯。

sentences.english: Thinking negatively can become a habit.
sentences.chinese: 消极的思维方式会成为一种习惯。

sentences.english: She has a habit of playing with her hair when she’s nervous.
sentences.chinese: 她有一个习惯，一紧张就拨弄自己的头发。

sentences.english: Some people drink alcohol as much from habit as from desire.
sentences.chinese: 有些人喝酒既是因为想喝，也是出于习惯。

detailed_translations.english: something that you do regularly or usually, often without thinking about it because you have done it so many times before

sentences.english: The house comprises two bedrooms, a kitchen, and a living room.
sentences.chinese: 这座房子有两间卧室、一间厨房和一间起居室。

sentences.english: Women comprise a high proportion of part-time workers.
sentences.chinese: 兼职人员中妇女占了很大一部分。

detailed_translations.english: to consist of particular parts, groups etc

sentences.english: In the absence of any evidence, the police had to let Myers go.
sentences.chinese: 警察没有证据，只好把迈尔斯放了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缺席， 不在； 缺席的时间， 外出期； 缺乏， 不存在
detailed_translations.english: when you are not in the place where people expect you to be, or the time that you are away

sentences.english: New technology is going to revolutionize everything we do.
sentences.chinese: 新科技将彻底改变我们做的每一件事。

sentences.english: His work revolutionized the treatment of this disease.
sentences.chinese: 他的研究成果给这种疾病的治疗带来了革命。

detailed_translations.english: to completely change the way people do something or think about something

sentences.english: He talked constantly about his work.
sentences.chinese: 他不断地谈到他的工作。

sentences.english: The English language is constantly changing .
sentences.chinese: 英语在不断地变化。

detailed_translations.english: all the time, or very often

sentences.english: Karen had seldom seen him so angry.
sentences.chinese: 卡伦很少见他这么生气过。

detailed_translations.english: very rarely or almost never

sentences.english: Unfortunately, you were out when we called.
sentences.chinese: 很遗憾，我们来的时候你出去了。

detailed_translations.english: used when you are mentioning a fact that you wish was not true

sentences.english: The revolutionaries expunged domestic opposition.
sentences.chinese: 革命者清洗了国内反对派。

detailed_translations.english: to remove a name from a list, piece of information, or book

sentences.english: The trial was held under tight security .
sentences.chinese: 这场审讯是在戒备森严的情况下进行的。

sentences.english: lax security at airline check-in desks
sentences.chinese: 登机手续柜台松懈的安全措施

sentences.english: terrorist activity that is a threat to national security
sentences.chinese: 威胁国家安全的恐怖活动

sentences.english: The prison was ordered to tighten security after a prisoner escaped yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天一名囚犯越狱后，该监狱被勒令加强安全措施。

sentences.english: The Security Commission investigates breaches of security .
sentences.chinese: 安全委员会对违反安全规定的事项进行调查。

sentences.english: We have been asked not to say anything for security reasons .
sentences.chinese: 出于安全考虑，我们被要求守口如瓶。

sentences.english: The security forces opened fire, killing two people.
sentences.chinese: 保安部队开枪打死了两个人。

sentences.english: The thief was caught on a security camera .
sentences.chinese: 小偷被保安摄像机当场拍了下来。

sentences.english: There are strict security checks on everyone entering the Opera House.
sentences.chinese: 每个人进入歌剧院都要接受严格的安全检查。

sentences.english: A large number of homes lack adequate security measures .
sentences.chinese: 许多住宅都未采取足够的安全措施。

detailed_translations.english: things that are done to keep a person, building, or country safe from danger or crime

sentences.english: She reached out to touch his arm.
sentences.chinese: 她伸手去碰他的胳膊。

sentences.english: If your house has been burgled, you shouldn’t touch anything until the police arrive.
sentences.chinese: 如果家中被盗，在警察赶到之前不要动任何物品。

sentences.english: ‘Don’t touch me!’ she yelled.
sentences.chinese: “别碰我！”她大叫道。

sentences.english: Her plight has touched the hearts of people around the world.
sentences.chinese: 她的困境触动了全世界人的心弦。

sentences.english: She felt a gentle touch on her shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 她感到有人轻轻碰了一下她的肩膀。

detailed_translations.english: to put your hand, finger etc on someone or something
the action of putting your hand, finger, or another part of your body on something or someone

sentences.english: an essay comparing and contrasting (= showing how two things are similar and different ) Verdi and Wagner and their operas
sentences.chinese: 把威尔第和瓦格纳以及他们的歌剧进行比较和对照的一篇文章

detailed_translations.chinese: 形成对比， 对比之下显出区别
detailed_translations.english: if two things contrast, the difference between them is very easy to see and is sometimes surprising
something that is very different from something else
if two things contrast, the difference between them is very easy to see and is sometimes surprising

sentences.english: Alexander Graham Bell invented the telephone in 1876.
sentences.chinese: 亚历山大 · 格雷厄姆 · 贝尔于1876年发明了电话。

detailed_translations.english: to make, design, or think of a new type of thing

sentences.english: The drop in consumer spending reflects concern about the economy.
sentences.chinese: 消费支出的下降反映出人们对经济的担忧。

detailed_translations.english: if a person or a thing is reflected in a mirror, glass, or water, you can see an image of the person or thing on the surface of the mirror, glass, or water

sentences.english: a complex system of highways
sentences.chinese: 复杂的公路网

sentences.english: Photosynthesis is a highly complex process.
sentences.chinese: 光合作用是一个非常复杂的过程。

sentences.english: When children enter the equation , further tensions may arise within a marriage.
sentences.chinese: 有了孩子以后，婚姻中可能出现新的矛盾。

detailed_translations.english: a problem or situation in which several things must be considered and dealt with

sentences.english: Her skin felt smooth and cool.
sentences.chinese: 她的皮肤摸上去又滑又凉。

sentences.english: a smooth pebble
sentences.chinese: 光滑的卵石

sentences.english: The stone steps had been worn smooth .
sentences.chinese: 石阶被磨得光溜溜的了。

sentences.english: She stood up and smoothed down her frock.
sentences.chinese: 她站了起来，抚平了自己的连衣裙。

detailed_translations.english: a smooth surface has no rough parts, lumps, or holes, especially in a way that is pleasant and attractive to touch

detailed_translations.chinese: 使光滑；消除（障碍等）；使优雅；缓和
detailed_translations.english: to make a rough surface flat and even
If you smooth something, you move your hands over its surface to make it smooth and flat

sentences.english: The average American has not even thought about next year’s election.
sentences.chinese: 普通的美国人甚至还没有想过明年的选举。

sentences.english: In an average week I drive about 250 miles.
sentences.chinese: 平常我每周开车约250英里。

detailed_translations.english: having qualities that are typical of most people or things

sentences.english: Rosa shut the door quietly.
sentences.chinese: 罗莎悄悄关上门。

sentences.english: ‘I’m sorry,’ she said quietly.
sentences.chinese: “对不起。”她轻声说道。

sentences.english: a quietly-spoken man (= one who always speaks quietly )
sentences.chinese: 说话轻柔的男人

detailed_translations.english: without making much noise

sentences.english: Read the manufacturer's guidelines before discarding the box.
sentences.chinese: 先阅读制造商的说明书再把盒子丢掉。

detailed_translations.chinese: 丢弃， 抛弃， 遗弃
detailed_translations.english: If you discard something, you get rid of it because you no longer want it or need it

sentences.english: He’s never been to Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他从未去过澳大利亚。

sentences.english: I’m never going back there again, not as long as I live.
sentences.chinese: 只要我活着，我再也不会回到那儿去。

sentences.english: It is never too late to give up smoking.
sentences.chinese: 戒烟不言晚。

sentences.english: (= never after a particular time ) would he return to Naples.
sentences.chinese: 他再也不会回到那不勒斯。

detailed_translations.english: not at any time, or not once

sentences.english: They have decided to initiate legal proceedings against the newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定向该报提起法律诉讼。

sentences.english: Intellectuals have initiated a debate on terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 知识分子就恐怖主义发起了辩论。

detailed_translations.chinese: 开始， 创造， 发起； 使初步了解； 接纳， 让…加入
detailed_translations.english: to arrange for something important to start, such as an official process or a new plan
someone who has been allowed to join a particular organization, club, or group and has been taught its secrets

sentences.english: He was one of the most powerful men in Bohemia.
sentences.chinese: 他是波希米亚最有权势的人物之一。

sentences.english: a very influential and powerful family
sentences.chinese: 很有权势的家庭

sentences.english: a powerful speech
sentences.chinese: 有感染力的演讲

detailed_translations.english: a powerful person, organization, group etc is able to control and influence events and other people’s actions

sentences.english: The purpose of this meeting is to elect a new chairman.
sentences.chinese: 这次会议的目的是选出一位新主席。

detailed_translations.english: the purpose of something is what it is intended to achieve

sentences.english: He was regarded as the most successful president of modern times.
sentences.chinese: 他被看成是近代最成功的总统。

detailed_translations.english: to think about someone or something in a particular way

sentences.english: daily flights to Miami
sentences.chinese: 每日飞往迈阿密的航班

sentences.english: China Daily receives dispatches from all parts of the world.
sentences.chinese: 《中国日报》收到世界各地发来的电讯。

detailed_translations.english: happening or done every day
a newspaper that is printed and sold every day, or every day except Sunday

sentences.english: This last task is possibly the most difficult.
sentences.chinese: 这最后一项任务也许是最难的。

sentences.english: It will take three weeks, possibly longer.
sentences.chinese: 要花三个星期，也许更久。

sentences.english: ‘Will you be here tomorrow?’ ‘Possibly.’
sentences.chinese: “你明天到这儿来吗？”“也许吧。”

sentences.english: ‘Was it murder?’ ‘ Quite possibly (= it is very likely ) .’
sentences.chinese: “是谋杀吗？”“很可能是。”

detailed_translations.english: used when saying that something may be true or likely, although you are not completely certain

sentences.english: a potentially dangerous situation
sentences.chinese: 有潜在危险的局势

detailed_translations.english: something that is potentially dangerous, useful etc is not dangerous etc now, but may become so in the future

sentences.english: The rent is reasonable and, moreover, the location is perfect.
sentences.chinese: 租金合理，而且位置也非常好。

sentences.english: The source of the information is irrelevant. Moreover, the information need not be confidential.
sentences.chinese: 信息来源无关紧要，而且也不一定必须是机密的。

detailed_translations.english: in addition – used to introduce information that adds to or supports what has previously been said

sentences.english: The Sergeant told Swift to guard the entrance.
sentences.chinese: 中士叫斯威夫特守着入口。

sentences.english: a lioness guarding her cubs
sentences.chinese: 守护着幼狮的母狮

sentences.english: There were two security guards on duty outside the building.
sentences.chinese: 大楼外面有两名保安在值勤。

detailed_translations.english: to protect a person, place, or object by staying near them and watching them
someone whose job is to protect a place or person

sentences.english: Tuberculosis is still common in some parts of the world .
sentences.chinese: 结核病在世界上某些地区仍很常见。

sentences.english: At that time China was the most powerful country in the world .
sentences.chinese: 当时中国是世界上最强大的国家。

sentences.english: The Taj Mahal attracts visitors from around the world .
sentences.chinese: 泰姬陵吸引了来自世界各地的游客。

sentences.english: Students from all over the world come to study at Oxford.
sentences.chinese: 世界各地的学生到牛津大学来求学。

sentences.english: Children are the same the world over .
sentences.chinese: 全世界的孩子都一样。

sentences.english: The book has been published throughout the world .
sentences.chinese: 这本书已在世界各地出版。

sentences.english: There is nothing quite like it anywhere in the world .
sentences.chinese: 世界上任何地方都找不出和它类似的东西。

sentences.english: Europe’s relationship with the rest of the world
sentences.chinese: 欧洲和世界上其他地区的关系

sentences.english: I decided to take a year off to travel the world .
sentences.chinese: 我决定休息一年去周游世界。

sentences.english: a crime that shocked the world
sentences.chinese: 震惊全世界的罪行

detailed_translations.chinese: 世界；领域；世俗；全人类；物质生活
detailed_translations.english: the  planet  we live on, and all the people, cities, and countries on it

sentences.english: There are plans to split the corporation into a number of smaller independent companies.
sentences.chinese: 有计划要把这家大企业分割成一些独立的小公司。

sentences.english: an independent charity
sentences.chinese: 独立的慈善机构

sentences.english: small independent bookshops
sentences.chinese: 私营小书店

sentences.english: schools in the independent sector
sentences.chinese: 私立学校

detailed_translations.english: an independent organization is not owned or controlled by, or does not receive money from, another organization or the government

sentences.english: In each of these cases, one of the models evolved independently of the other.
sentences.chinese: 在这里的每种情况下，其中一个模型独立于另一个模型而发展。

sentences.english: Service each copy independently: You can update one copy without affecting any of the other ones.
sentences.chinese: 独立维护每个副本： 可以独立更新某一个副本，而不影响其他的副本。

sentences.english: We have two motors, one on each rear wheel, so the control system has to control each motor independently.
sentences.chinese: 而且我们有两个，每一个后轮都有一个，说以控制系统必须独立地控制每一个电机。

sentences.english: He clanged his sword three times on his shield.
sentences.chinese: 他用他的剑当当当地敲了3下盾。

sentences.english: He used his left hand as a shield against the reflecting sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 他用左手遮挡反射过来的阳光。

sentences.english: He held up his hands, shielding his eyes from the sun.
sentences.chinese: 他抬手遮住眼睛免受阳光照射。

detailed_translations.english: a large piece of metal or leather that soldiers used in the past to protect themselves when fighting
to protect someone or something from being harmed or damaged

sentences.english: Wyatt glanced around the restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 怀亚特环视了一下餐馆。

sentences.english: Emily glanced over her shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 埃米莉回头看了一眼。

sentences.english: He gave her a quick glance and smiled.
sentences.chinese: 他迅速地瞥了她一眼，笑了。

detailed_translations.english: to quickly look at someone or something
a quick look

sentences.english: The Budapest office plans to hire freelance reporters to cover the latest happenings.
sentences.chinese: 布达佩斯办事处计划聘用自由职业记者来报道最近发生的事件。

detailed_translations.english: something that happens, especially a strange event

sentences.english: The bank charges a fixed rate for each transaction.
sentences.chinese: 银行对每一笔业务收取固定费用。

sentences.english: the transaction of government business
sentences.chinese: 处理政府事务

detailed_translations.english: a business deal or action, such as buying or selling something

sentences.english: The government has promised that the army will be called in to help if there is a firemen’s strike.
sentences.chinese: 政府承诺，如消防员罢工，就将调军队来协助。

detailed_translations.english: a period of time when a group of workers deliberately stop working because of a disagreement about pay, working conditions etc

sentences.english: We dumped our bags at the nearby Grand Hotel and hurried toward the market.
sentences.chinese: 我们把包扔在附近的格兰德旅馆，急匆匆地向市场赶去。

sentences.english: a campaign to stop cheap European beef being dumped in West Africa
sentences.chinese: 阻止在西非倾销廉价欧洲牛肉的运动

detailed_translations.english: If you dump something somewhere, you put it or unload it there quickly and carelessly.

sentences.english: Occasionally Alice would look up from her books.
sentences.chinese: 艾丽斯偶尔会从书中抬起头来。

sentences.english: The tension was becoming unbearable, and I wanted to scream.
sentences.chinese: 这种紧张变得难以忍受，我真想大声尖叫。

sentences.english: Muscle tension can be a sign of stress.
sentences.chinese: 肌肉紧张可能是压力大的迹象。

sentences.english: This wire will take 50 pounds tension.
sentences.chinese: 这种金属线能承受50磅的张力。

detailed_translations.english: a nervous worried feeling that makes it impossible for you to relax

sentences.english: The probable cause of the fire was faulty wiring.
sentences.chinese: 起火的原因很可能是电路故障。

sentences.english: Success is highly probable .
sentences.chinese: 成功的希望相当大。

detailed_translations.english: likely to exist, happen, or be true

detailed_translations.chinese: 很可能的事；大有希望的候选者
detailed_translations.english: someone who is likely to be chosen for a team, to win a race etc

sentences.english: He has a lot of talent , and his work is fresh and interesting.
sentences.chinese: 他很有天赋，作品新颖有趣。

sentences.english: a persuasive speaker with a natural talent for leadership
sentences.chinese: 有领导天赋、颇有辩才的演说者

sentences.english: His latest book reveals hidden talents.
sentences.chinese: 他最新的一本书展现了他深藏不露的才能。

sentences.english: Sadly, she inherited none of her father’s musical talent.
sentences.chinese: 可惜的是，她一点都没有继承她父亲的音乐天赋。

sentences.english: He is a great talent.
sentences.chinese: 他是个了不起的人才。

sentences.english: Britain’s footballing talent
sentences.chinese: 英国的足球天才

detailed_translations.english: a natural ability to do something well

sentences.english: financial transactions
sentences.chinese: 财务往来

sentences.english: financial assistance
sentences.chinese: 财务援助

sentences.english: a financial advisor
sentences.chinese: 财务顾问

sentences.english: Organic farmers should be encouraged with financial incentives.
sentences.chinese: 应对实行有机栽培的农民给予经济上的鼓励。

sentences.english: It was a wonderful film, but not exactly a financial success (= something that makes a profit ) .
sentences.chinese: 这是一部出色的影片，但在票房上不是很成功。

detailed_translations.english: relating to money or the management of money

sentences.english: A man came to read the electricity meter .
sentences.chinese: 有个男的来抄电表。

detailed_translations.chinese: 米；仪表；[计量] 公尺；韵律
detailed_translations.english: a machine that measures the level of something
to measure how much of something is used, and how much you must pay for it, by using a meter

sentences.english: ceramic ware
sentences.chinese: 陶瓷制品

sentences.english: He travelled from town to town selling his wares.
sentences.chinese: 他走乡串镇出售自己的货品。

detailed_translations.english: objects made of the material or in the way or place mentioned

sentences.english: He ordered the jury to disregard the witness’s last statement.
sentences.chinese: 他指示陪审团忽略证人的最后一句话。

sentences.english: his disregard for her feelings
sentences.chinese: 他对她情感的忽略

detailed_translations.english: to ignore something or treat it as unimportant
when someone ignores something that they should not ignore

sentences.english: As we saw in the preceding chapter, groups can be powerful agents of socialization.
sentences.chinese: 如我们在前一章所见，团组可以是社会化的有力动因。

detailed_translations.english: happening or coming before the time, place, or part mentioned

sentences.english: Her paintings invite comparison with those of the early Impressionists (= they remind you of them ) .
sentences.chinese: 她的画作让人想起早期的印象派作品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比较， 对照； 比拟， 比喻
detailed_translations.english: the process of comparing two or more people or things

sentences.english: advanced learners of English
sentences.chinese: 高级程度的英语学习者

sentences.english: advanced physics
sentences.chinese: 高等物理（学）

detailed_translations.english: studying or dealing with a school subject at a difficult level

sentences.english: $20 an hour is the going rate (= the usual amount paid ) for private tuition.
sentences.chinese: 每小时20美元是私人授课的一般收费。

sentences.english: The company seems to rate him very highly (= think he is very good) .
sentences.chinese: 公司好像对他的评价很高。

detailed_translations.english: a charge or payment that is set according to a standard scale
to think that someone or something has a particular quality, value, or standard

sentences.english: Ellen flew across the room and greeted her uncle with a kiss.
sentences.chinese: 埃伦从房间那头飞奔过来，给了她叔叔一个吻。

sentences.english: By the time the police arrived, the men had flown.
sentences.chinese: 警察赶到时，那些人已经逃走了。

detailed_translations.english: to move somewhere quickly and suddenly

sentences.english: This is a well researched and very readable book.
sentences.chinese: 这是一本研究深刻、可读性强的书。

detailed_translations.english: interesting and enjoyable to read, and easy to understand

sentences.english: There were several possibilities open to each manufacturer.
sentences.chinese: 每个制造商都可以有几种不同的选择。

detailed_translations.english: A possibility is one of several different things that could be done.

sentences.english: What is a reasonable standard for one family is not applicable for another.
sentences.chinese: 对一个家庭合理的标准对于另一个家庭并不适用。

detailed_translations.english: if something is applicable to a particular person, group, or situation, it affects them or is related to them

sentences.english: Ballet is essentially a middle-class interest.
sentences.chinese: 芭蕾舞基本上是中产阶级感兴趣的东西。

sentences.english: Suicide rates have remained essentially unchanged.
sentences.chinese: 自杀率基本上保持不变。

sentences.english: Essentially, we are talking about the cold war period.
sentences.chinese: 我们基本上是在谈论冷战时期。

detailed_translations.english: used when stating the most basic facts about something

sentences.english: People might well confuse the two products.
sentences.chinese: 人们很容易混淆这两种产品。

detailed_translations.english: to think wrongly that a person or thing is someone or something else

sentences.english: Employees must familiarize themselves with the health and safety manual.
sentences.chinese: 雇员必须熟悉健康和安全手册。

detailed_translations.english: to learn about something so that you understand it, or to teach someone else about something so that they understand it

sentences.english: We are hoping to find a suitable school.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望能找到一所合适的学校。

detailed_translations.english: having the right qualities for a particular person, purpose, or situation

sentences.english: Like most of my generation, I had never known a war.
sentences.chinese: 和我们这一代的大多数人一样，我并没有经历过战争。

sentences.english: In my generation the divorce rate is very high.
sentences.chinese: 我们这一代人离婚率很高。

sentences.english: the need to preserve the planet for future generations
sentences.chinese: 为子孙后代保护地球的必要性

sentences.english: The story has been handed down from generation to generation.
sentences.chinese: 这个故事是一代一代传下来的。

sentences.english: the generation of electricity
sentences.chinese: 发电

detailed_translations.english: all people of about the same age

sentences.english: Much of the land was of poor quality.
sentences.chinese: 很多地的土质很差。

sentences.english: Use only high quality ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 只使用上等的材料。

sentences.english: the drug’s addictive quality
sentences.chinese: 毒品令人上瘾的特性

detailed_translations.english: how good or bad something is

sentences.english: The disease is caused by a defective gene.
sentences.chinese: 这种疾病是由缺陷基因引起的。

sentences.english: defective products
sentences.chinese: 残次品

detailed_translations.english: not made properly, or not working properly

detailed_translations.chinese: 有缺陷的人；不完全变化词

sentences.english: I watched the first few episodes, but soon lost interest.
sentences.chinese: 我看了前几集，但很快就失去了兴趣。

sentences.english: The last round of bidding aroused considerable interest.
sentences.chinese: 最后一轮竞价引起人们相当大的兴趣。

sentences.english: Our survey reveals a disturbing lack of interest in teacher training.
sentences.chinese: 我们的调查显示人们对教师培训失去了兴趣，这很令人不安。

sentences.english: I read your article with great interest.
sentences.chinese: 我兴致勃勃地拜读了您的文章。

sentences.english: to promote/protect/safeguard sb's interests
sentences.chinese: 为某人的利益游说；保护 / 维护某人的利益

sentences.english: The money was repaid with interest.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱是带息偿还的。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that you have when you want to know or learn more about sb/sth

sentences.english: She taught me fractions and counting.
sentences.chinese: 他教我分数和计算。

detailed_translations.english: to give lessons in a school, college, or university, or to help someone learn about something by giving them information

sentences.english: procedural rules
sentences.chinese: 程序性的规定

detailed_translations.english: connected with a procedure, especially in a law court

sentences.english: It is impossible to hypnotise someone simply by saying a particular word or phrase.
sentences.chinese: 不可能仅通过说某个词或短语就能把人催眠。

sentences.english: Who first used the phrase ‘survival of the fittest’?
sentences.chinese: “适者生存”这一说法最早是谁说的？

sentences.english: Shakespeare’s plays are full of well-known phrases .
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亚的戏剧中写满了众所周知的名言警句。

detailed_translations.english: a group of words without a finite verb, especially when they are used to form part of a sentence, such as ‘walking along the road’ and ‘a bar of soap’

sentences.english: advertising that specifically targets children
sentences.chinese: 专门针对儿童的广告

detailed_translations.chinese: 特别地， 特定地； 明确地， 具体地
detailed_translations.english: relating to or intended for one particular type of person or thing only

sentences.english: No littering. Penalty $500.
sentences.chinese: 禁止乱扔垃圾。 违者罚款500美元。

sentences.english: Withdrawing the money early will result in a 10% penalty.
sentences.chinese: 提前支取这笔钱将被处以10%的罚金。

sentences.english: If he is convicted, he could receive the death penalty (= be killed as a punishment ) .
sentences.chinese: 一旦定罪，他可能会被判处死刑。

detailed_translations.english: a punishment for breaking a law, rule, or legal agreement

sentences.english: 34 protesters were arrested for violating criminal law.
sentences.chinese: 34名抗议者因违反刑法而被逮捕。

sentences.english: regimes that violate human rights
sentences.chinese: 侵犯人权的政权

detailed_translations.english: to disobey or do something against an official agreement, law, principle etc

sentences.english: It can give you the ability to store indefinitely your session data where it can be retrieved not only after a restart, but from any of a number of machines in a cluster.
sentences.chinese: 它可以给予您无限地存储会话数据的能力，使您的会话数据不仅可以在重新启动后检索，还可以从群集中许多机器中的任意一个检索。

sentences.english: Assuming the systems keep operating, like I've said, we can command the vehicle from the ground and operate it fine, and remain on orbit indefinitely.
sentences.chinese: 假定系统继续运行，我和所说的那样，我们可以很好地从地面指挥和操作飞船，使它无限期地留在轨道上。

detailed_translations.english: without giving clear or exact details

sentences.english: There are two major political parties in the US.
sentences.chinese: 美国有两大政党。

sentences.english: The government’s major concern is with preventing road accidents.
sentences.chinese: 政府关注的大事是预防道路交通事故。

sentences.english: Smoking is one of the major causes of cancer.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟是引发癌症的元凶之一。

sentences.english: the major developments in computer technology
sentences.chinese: 计算机技术的重大进步

sentences.english: He’s majoring in Political Science.

sentences.chinese: 小路到这里好像完全消失了。

sentences.english: The main crops were oats and barley.
sentences.chinese: 主要作物是燕麦和大麦。

detailed_translations.english: successful, and working in the way that was intended

sentences.chinese: 他政治上最重大的成就是废除了死刑。

sentences.english: Please inform us if there are any significant changes in your plans.

sentences.english: Guests should feel at liberty to avail themselves of your facilities.
sentences.chinese: 客人们应可以随意使用你们的设施。

sentences.chinese: 大多数的电脑使用者都没有经过正规的键盘操作训练，因此他们的键盘技巧不够熟练。

sentences.chinese: 画家把自己的思想转换成视觉画面。

sentences.english: This oil lubricates efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 这油能有效地起润滑作用。

sentences.english: That means I have to work more efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 那就意味着我要工作的更有效率。

sentences.chinese: 另一些人喜欢他们则是因为他们偏好于更有效的通信，不会错过一些重要的交谈和联系。
