sentences.chinese: 销售额比预期低5%。

sentences.chinese: 销量比预期要好。

sentences.chinese: 接三通管的手术

sentences.chinese: 我想唤起他的善良本性，但他就是不同意帮助我们。

sentences.chinese: 从本质而言，资本主义社会是不稳定的。

sentences.chinese: 他们后院有个漂亮的游泳池。

sentences.chinese: 我听到他的卧室门关上了。

sentences.chinese: 她在床上躺下，闭上眼睛。

sentences.chinese: 他们有可能积极地回应该总统的援助请求。

sentences.chinese: 这首歌又枯燥又重复。

sentences.chinese: 过一段时间之后，如果新换上的金丝雀安然无恙，矿工们又可以安全地重返矿井。

sentences.chinese: 科内尔公司运营了半途房屋、青年监狱，同时他们还注意到对吸毒者治疗需求的上升，房屋和工作安排项目将使得犯人重返社会。

sentences.chinese: 或者，某些计算机用户可能总是完全删除并将信息重新输入到新的记录中，而不要仅仅编辑旧记录 —— 一种与老技术相联系的残留行为。

sentences.chinese: 她开始重新摆放起居室的家具。

sentences.english: You just search for an artist, song, album , or just a random search tag.
sentences.chinese: 你只需要搜索艺术家、歌曲、相册、或者仅仅是一个随机搜索标签。

sentences.chinese: 死亡人数远远超过最初的预料。

sentences.chinese: 喂，接线员吗？请帮我接31号房间。

sentences.chinese: 燃料价格持续上涨。

sentences.chinese: 他自以为很了不起。

sentences.chinese: 厨房的一根管道爆裂，弄得满地都是水。

sentences.chinese: 展览会的全部费用是40万英镑。

sentences.chinese: 总的结果是人口增加。

sentences.chinese: 总冠军和第二名被选了出来。

sentences.english: He received a six-month suspension for unprofessional behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 他因有违职业道德的行为被停职六个月。

sentences.english: I asked the nurse how my son was progressing.
sentences.chinese: 我询问护士我儿子身体恢复得如何。

detailed_translations.english: the process of getting better at doing something, or getting closer to finishing or achieving something
to improve, develop, or achieve things so that you are then at a more advanced stage

sentences.english: We have to tackle the fundamental cause of the problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须解决问题的根本原因。

sentences.english: the fundamental principles of liberty and equality
sentences.chinese: 自由和平等这两个基本原则

detailed_translations.english: relating to the most basic and important parts of something

sentences.english: Their claim had no basis in fact (=  it was not true  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的说法没有事实根据。

detailed_translations.chinese: 基础， 根据； 原则
detailed_translations.english: the facts, ideas, or things from which something can be developed

sentences.english: To stop a problem you have to understand its underlying causes.
sentences.chinese: 要解决问题，你得了解其潜在原因。

detailed_translations.english: The underlying features of an object, event, or situation are not obvious, and it may be difficult to discover or reveal them

sentences.english: a sound understanding of money and banking systems
sentences.chinese: 对货币和银行业体制的透彻理解

sentences.english: a sound knowledge of English
sentences.chinese: 扎实的英语知识

sentences.english: He has sound grasp of European history.
sentences.chinese: 他对欧洲历史有着透彻的理解。

detailed_translations.english: complete and thorough

sentences.english: The work she does is absolutely vital.
sentences.chinese: 她所做的工作至关重要。

sentences.english: It is vital to be honest with your children.
sentences.chinese: 对自己的孩子坦诚十分重要。

sentences.english: The tourist industry is of vital importance to the national economy.
sentences.chinese: 旅游业对国家的经济至关重要。

sentences.english: Richardson played a vital role in the team’s success.
sentences.chinese: 理查森对球队的成功起了极重要的作用。

sentences.english: The samples could give scientists vital information about long-term changes in the earth’s atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 这些样本可以给科学家提供关于地球大气长期变化的极其重要的资料。

detailed_translations.english: extremely important and necessary for something to succeed or exist

sentences.english: Religion matters very much at a national level.
sentences.chinese: 宗教事务在全国都非常重要。

sentences.english: Between 1929 and 1933 America’s national income fell by more than half.
sentences.chinese: 1929至1933年间，美国的国民收入下降过半。

sentences.english: There are strong indications that the Prime Minister will call national elections in May.
sentences.chinese: 有明显迹象预示首相将于5月召集全国大选。

detailed_translations.english: related to a whole nation as opposed to any of its parts

sentences.english: Harvey gets a $50 commission every time he makes a sale (= sells something as part of his job ) .
sentences.chinese: 哈维每做成一笔生意可得到50美元的佣金。

sentences.english: Car salesmen will often bring down the price rather than lose a sale (= fail to sell something ) .
sentences.chinese: 汽车推销员常常宁愿降价也不愿失去一笔生意。

sentences.english: arms sales to Iran
sentences.chinese: 对伊朗的军火销售

detailed_translations.chinese: 销售；出售；拍卖；销售额；廉价出售
detailed_translations.english: when you sell something

sentences.english: Teenagers and their parents rarely agree.
sentences.chinese: 十几岁的孩子跟父母意见很少一致。

detailed_translations.english: to have or express the same opinion about something as someone else

sentences.english: The fully inclusive fare for the trip is £22.
sentences.chinese: 这次出行的全部费用为22英镑。

sentences.english: The rent is £120 a week, inclusive of heating.
sentences.chinese: 房租连暖气费在内是每星期120英镑。

detailed_translations.english: an inclusive price or cost includes everything

sentences.english: Joe’s boyish charm
sentences.chinese: 乔身上的稚趣

sentences.english: She turned on the charm (= used her charm ) to all the men.
sentences.chinese: 她对所有那些男人都施展魅力。

sentences.english: The room had no windows and all the charm of a prison cell (= used to say that something has no charm ) .
sentences.chinese: 这房间没有窗，简直就是牢房。

detailed_translations.english: a special quality someone or something has that makes people like them, feel attracted to them, or be easily influenced by them – used to show approval

sentences.english: Which band had a hit with ‘Bohemian Rhapsody’?
sentences.chinese: 《波希米亚狂想曲》是哪支乐队风行一时的歌曲？

detailed_translations.english: something such as a film, play, song etc that is very popular and successful

sentences.english: Andy’s doing a one-year journalism course.
sentences.chinese: 安迪正在修读为期一年的新闻课程。

sentences.english: During the course of our conversation, it emerged that Bob had been in prison.
sentences.chinese: 我们在谈话过程中得知鲍勃坐过牢。

sentences.english: We had fish for the main course.
sentences.chinese: 我们的主菜是鱼。

detailed_translations.english: a series of lessons in a particular subject

sentences.english: a numerical code
sentences.chinese: 数字密码

sentences.english: The home team tried to utilize their numerical advantage (= the fact that they had more players than the other team ).
sentences.chinese: 主队试图利用他们在人数上的优势。

sentences.english: Make sure the files are organized in numerical order.
sentences.chinese: 务必把这些档案按数字顺序排列。

detailed_translations.english: expressed or considered in numbers

sentences.english: digital TV
sentences.chinese: 数字电视

sentences.english: a digital signal
sentences.chinese: 数字信号

sentences.english: a digital camera
sentences.chinese: 数码照相机

sentences.english: digital recording
sentences.chinese: 数字录音

detailed_translations.english: using a system in which information is recorded or sent out electronically in the form of numbers, usually ones and zeros

sentences.english: The robe was held at the waist by a cord.
sentences.chinese: 在袍子腰处束了根细绳。

sentences.english: He pulled explosives and some tangled cord from his bag.
sentences.chinese: 他从他的包里掏出炸药和一些乱糟糟的绳子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of thick string or thin rope
